The room attendants where thorough, one was a bit loony (Said there where ghosts in the hotel to a child in the elevator).  Restaurant was low class, with a high budget cost.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are always striving to improve our service offerings so we thank you for making us aware of your experiences. We do hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.

Summary: The rooms could use some paint and the capers need to be cleaned it had lots of stains. Overall was a nice hotel and was very accommodating for our family. Would stay here again. Breakfast and happy hour was great!

If you really want the best sleep a hotel can give you, this is the spot!  Quiet, comfy, and clean.  I travel on business a lot and I frequent higher end hotels. I ended up by chance my secretary dropped the ball and had to book this last minute.  I can tell you this, I will stay here when in the area.

Room was large - accommodated our family. Had 3 beds (one was sleeper sofa). Had two TVs - a plus since we had a teenager sleeping on the sleeper sofa.  Shower curtain wouldn't close all the way so water was a bit all over after the showers. A little mold forming (rm 221) on the ceiling of the bathroom but it could be wiped off easily (just makes you wonder what is under that wallpaper since wallpaper hides mold really well). Overall not too bad - can live with the things we identified.
Manager Response: Thank you Hamm Family for the great review! We are so glad we could accommodate your family with our spacious newly renovated suites. We will be sure to look into the issues you presented and make sure they are addressed properly. We take our feedback seriously and are appreciative of your response and valued business!

Summary: Room size was very large, 2 tvs lots of lighting and nice sitting area. Common areas were pretty and outside was well kept. Room was too hot and could not set cooler despite turning down to 60. I dropped something on the floor and had to move sofa, found change, hair band and something white, didn't investigate items in sofa or under. Comfy bed, brought my own pillows. Nice to have shuttle service although I didn't use this time. Breakfast was typical, good coffee. Mixer was a bummer-too much popcorn and chips. Had a burger from the restaurant one night-average. Overall good experience and will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for this wonderful feedback! We take pride in all that our Hotel has to offer and appreciate thorough feedback such as yours, in order to improve upon our services. We will take into consideration each area of service you mentioned and will be sure to address them. Thank you and we hope to see you again!

Summary: A remodeled version of an old Embassy Suites design....still putting in final details.  Nicely done improvements while keeping the interior atrium...which I like.  Very good staff!  An excellent investment in a robust internet way above most of this brand, and I have stayed in several.  Well thought out improvements to an old design creating comfort, good service for a very fair price.  I would return.  I would suggest that the tweak the restaurant dinner menu a bit...a bit pricey and while it has been remodeled and functions well the price point will push people to drive outside.  For business meal many dishes pushed to or past suggested per dium amounts when you total the potential bill.
Manager Response: Thank you for this wonderful review. We take our guest feedback very seriously and do appreciate your thoroughness. We will continue to provide wonderful customer service and will look into your ideas for our restaurant. Thank you again for your feedback and valued business.

Summary Heading: Good Clean Hotel With Great Breakfast
Summary: This hotel is pretty clean. Nothing weird here. It's an older. It could use some updates but nothing to complain about. My kids enjoyed the pool. And the sauna was nice. It also has a sun deck. The food was incredible. Breakfast was great. Room service was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Jeffery!   We are glad you were able to enjoy our pool and complimentary breakfast. We take pride in all that our Hotel has to offer and we are continually looking to improve. Thank you again for you feedback and for your valued business.

Summary: Always enjoyed staying at the embassy suites hotel. Clean rooms. Love the roomnes of the rooms. Breakfast saves so much time and enjoy a drink in the afternoon with some snack at the swmming pool area.

This hotel was very dirty, the sheets in the room were full of blood. The restroom was dirty. Over all for the price we paid it should have been a better hotel. I won't stay at this hotel again. Hilton is usually very clean
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty to the Hilton family of hotels. Please accept our apologies for the condition of your room. Of course that is not our goal and we will use this review as a training opportunity for improvement. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: We visited Disneyland and stayed here. The drive to the park was about 15 to 18 minutes. There is a night club in the parking lot and a recycle facility at the end of the block. We experienced the sound of large trucks in the morning and club-goers at night, but they did not keep us awake.

I called to the hotel after I complete the reservation to make sure they assign an accesible room for my daugther, they confirmed but when we arrived room was assigned to other guest and to accomodate us they want to charge additional amount for 2 extra days and move us to the right room in the middle of the trip. Not happy with their service and capacity from the GM to resolve a situation

Large King Suite with all the amenities.  Clean and fresh.  Online check-in was easy, with the ability to choose my room.  At arrival, I picked up my keys and was on my way to my room within minutes.  The staff was friendly, quick and efficient.  Complimentary breakfast was a good value.  I did not participate in the evening cocktails, but another nice feature.  Indoor pool for the kids.  Good location to the 91 FWY and all Orange County has to offer.  Easy checkout with a printed and emailed receipt.  The location is close to friends.  I will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for a wonderful review, Kim! We're so glad we could provide a great stay for you, and that you were able to take advantage of our e-check in and complimentary breakfast! We can't wait to see you in the near future. Thank you for your valued business!

Summary: Good trip first class hotel. Breakfast was excellent we were minutes from the American Sports Center on Anaheim and Cerritos. Staff was professional and helpful. There was plenty of parking. The hotel was just off Hwy 91 and one exit from Hwy 57.

This hotel is nice, but a little outdated.  My biggest complaint was the shower would go ice cold every time I was in there.  Very annoying.  The breakfast was excellent and the food in the restaurant was good too. Very good service and friendly staff.  The location is pretty far from everything though and I hated the view from our room of a noisy recycling plant.  The indoor pool was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your helpful feedback! We truly appreciate our guests' reviews as we see it as a learning tool for us to improve our guest experience. We will continue to provide excellent complimentary breakfast and wonderful customer service, and will look into the issues you presented. Thank you for your valued business and we hope to see you again.

Summary: The hotel staff were very good. They brought up extra towels right away.  But the hotel is feeling it age. The bed were very bad very hard. the bath room had paint peeling. Had a hard time parking because of a night club on the other side of the lot. Breakfast good.

If you're looking for a Disney stop over, or even you have business in the area, this hotel is a great choice.  Very clean; wonderful breakfast; renovations are nice. Staff is friendly and courteous.  I really enjoyed our stay!

I would definitely will be looking for Embassy Suites from now on, on my future stays in other states.. overall i not even one single complaint.. Highly recommended it to all my family and friends....

Great room, comfortable bed and pillows. Wonderful breakfast, lines get longer are the later you wait. Attentive staff, quick to fulfill your requests    Downside; they share a parking lot with a gentleman's club. So on weekend nights their parking lot is quite full and there's no direction given as to where you should park. After circling the lot a couple times, we realized that we just need to go to the back of the hotel instead of the front of the hotel. It would have been nice if desk staff had told us this as we checked in for the weekend.

Summary Heading: A little older, but nice hotel
Summary: We stayed here for a trip to Disneyland in February 2016.  This hotel seems a bit older than the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, but for the price we couldn't beat it!  It's a bit of a drive to Disneyland, but the hotel has the ART shuttle service for a small fee.    Staff were great, food at the breakfast was good, and the restaurant staff were great.  We will definitely stay here again when in the Orange County area.

Summary Heading: Good value for an enjoyable hotel.
Summary: We were going to Disney for one day and it was close by.  We were able to enjoy the manager's reception offered and the complimentary breakfast which added to the ease of our quick trip.  The kids also enjoyed the pool.

We booked this hotel with the history of our interaction with Embassy Suites being a great value. We attempted to check in early, with rooms allegedly not available. When another front desk attendant saw us waiting in the lobby over an hour, she asked if we needed help, and we told her we attempted to check in. She said she can easily check us in (contradicting our former attendant).  It took 15 minutes for the attendant to retrieve our bags with no one in front of us, further delaying arrival in our room. She did not make us aware of the $75 per day charge due to security, and when I inquired as to the large hold on our card, she stated the hotel policy and frequent fraud issues. Th at should have been addressed at checkin, in my opinion.  There is not an outdoor pool, of which

Room service menu is VERY limited. Breakfast in room not an option, can only be taken downstairs, and not a very good standard. It's clean, good speed wifi, and staff friendly and efficient. For the price it delivers what it promises. Noise from restaurant and bar downstairs can be heard in room. I was at level 5.

We looked for a Hilton property near Yorba Linda (Nixon Museum) and found this Embassy Suites.  Being near Anaheim, most of the traffic in this hotel is families going to DisneyLand.  That meant that the hotel has the feel of being a bit 'well used'.  Nevertheless, the staff were all totally trained in the friendliest of mannerisms.  Convenient location just off the highway.  Tip: choose a room on the back side of the hotel for least noise.

The three rooms we rented smelled like mold. The water in the shower kept turning cold every 5 minutes. We all showered with cold water the three nights we stayed. The breakfast schedule is super early it ends at 9 am, people are running to go get what ever they can five minutes before they take everything away. The Disney shuttle runs every hour. The rooms are spacious but the sofa bed is very uncomfortable. We called the reception desk but the offered no solutions or compensations.

The hotel is a very nice property and is located right off the freeway. The only negative is i had Brown Spiders in my room and there were lots of them on the exterior of the building. Better pest control should be used and cleaning of exterior areas where people gather to watch the Disney fireworks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are sincerely sorry to hear you encountered spiders in your room. Please be assured we have our maintenance team working on the issue to ensure it will not happen again in the future. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Embassy suites is amazing from the minute you drive onto the property until you have sadly leave. I love the interior of embassy suites. The decor is amazing and I love how the rooms are all inside the hotel. I love that you never actually have to go outside to your room. The service is always amazing and I love the managers complimentary drink hour. The breakfast is amazing. The best breakfast you could ask for. Overall I would give embassy suites a 6/5. Thank you for always giving us a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so glad to hear you were impressed by our service and all that the Embassy Suites brand has to offer, just as you expect every time. We hope your future travels find you in our area again. Thank you for your valued business.

Summary: During this stay, we were traveling with approximately 140 high students who were participating in a week long college tour between 3 states. Not one time did the staff seemed overwhelmed with our students or that they were irritated that there were so many young people running around.  The students were allowed to play in the pool, use the workout room and just hang out in the common area as every guest did.  That was a great relief to me being a chaperone.  I appreciated the great customer service.

Summary Heading: Not At All What I Expected From The Hilton Brand
Summary: The website says the hotel was recently renovated; however, our room was well worn from the linen to the furniture, the toilet leaked, and house keeping was substandard. I purchased cleaning products to clean the bathroom and wore shower shoes while bathing. Night club in the same parking lot as the hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Bren H,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry you were unhappy with our two-room suites. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.  Thank you again for your valued feedback.

Summary: On the first day of my 8 day stay, I noticed a few food items missing from my room, the couch cushions tossed aside, and a bunch of bedding left on a counter in the bedroom... When I asked the front desk about it I was told they would get back to me. They did not. The next day I asked again, and again I had no answers. I asked them to not go into my room until they had answers, but everyday for the next three days they still came in and cleaned (the pile of bedding remained on my counter the whole stay). At this point I asked the front desk again, and again got no answer. I  told them that their housekeepers were still cleaning my room, and I said to remove the request not to clean my room since it did nothing. My room wasn't cleaned again from that point on. Housekeeping made

Summary Heading: Not close to Disneyland & the shuttle passes every hour.
Summary: This is a nice hotel. Upsides: remodeled, sleeps  families of 6 & Breakfast is included in the rate.  Downsides: It's not close to Disneyland, the shuttle passes every hour and you must pay an additional cost & you only get free Wi-Fi if you are a Hilton honors member.

I'm a loyal embassy suites customer, just because the rooms fits the needs of my family.  2 comfortable rooms In a one bedroom and a pull out couch and tv in another room.  Nice clean hotel close to LAX breakfast in the morning.  Wonderful staff. I would definitely recommend and stay again! Thank you embassy for another wonderful stay!!

I went to the hotel because we were going to Disneyland. The Hotel is a bit further out from the park so if you do not like the crowds this hotel is for you. The Atrium with its beautiful waterfall and plentiful seating was great!

I stayed here for one week and this hotel was wonderful. They had complementary breakfast and evening cocktails  everyday. Staff was very nice and helpful. Shuttle to Disneyland. I would stay here again.

Summary Heading: Disney for the kids...free happy our for the parents!
Summary: We were visiting family in the area and they recommended this hotel. Well priced, includes a free buffet breakfast, made to order omelets. Free happy hour from 5:30-7:30. It appears they may have a shuttle to Dusneyland.   In the center of the 7-foor hotel is an attractive courtyard/atrium. The happy hour and breakfast are held in this area. At first I was concerned about the echo affect of the noise carrying up to the rooms but with the "suite layout" of the rooms any noise, if at all, would only be heard in the living room and not the bedriom. We never heard any noise from the atrium area.   The room was delightful. A living room with dinning table, 2 Tv's. Bathroom had a cool shower and it wasn't inside a bathtub! I loved it.  The hotel also has a restaurant.  One

I have stayed at this hotel many times over the years as I have family nearby. They continually improve and upgrade. The foyer is very comfortable for the free full breakfast and managers reception with free adult drinks. Rooms were upgraded last year. This is a hotel which improves with age, a bit of a rarity.

The room looked clean and new but for some reason the people in the room got 13 bug bites during our one night stay.  We did not see any windows opened.  Internet was fine.  Evening reception could use more variety.

Summary Heading: Hilton Guest Service Manager and staff deliver!
Summary: The Guest Service Manager and staff enabled a family trip experience to never be forgotten.  Much can be said about great service at hotels yet it is not common to say that a hotel manager and staff have given a young child, facing a terminal illness and a premature checkout issue, the chance fully enjoy the duration of reserved stay.

Beds were comfortable except you were to hot to sleep. Looks like they tried to make the room nice. Just cut a lot of corners poor remodled the room did not fix the sheet rock corrctly .5 days of staying the sheets did not get changed .experience for the price we paid 240 not imspressed
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so sorry to hear you stay was not what you expected. We will definitely look into the issues you presented and will be sure to address them. We appreciate your business and we hope to make it up to you in the future.

Summary: The stay was ok but not outstanding. There was sporatic house cleaning. Seems I always get a handicapped room. The air conditioning was tied to a sensor that would shut down when there was no activity.

One of the benefits of being a five year loyal Hilton Diamond member, as we travel the world, is knowing what to expect from each venue. Embassy Suites are always the same facility and meals. Being a Hilton brand, the service is always good. We enjoy knowing what to expect. So, we chose this hotel based on proximity to family we were visiting. We were not surprised the hotel was filled with families visiting Disneyland, so we took our breakfast on a tray to our room for a more quiet, peaceful meal.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for you continued loyalty! We're glad we could make your stay feel like home with the service you know and expect. We look forward to seeing you in the future! PS. We love breakfast in bed, too!

Summary: I really hate to say anything negative but being a Hilton owner, this hotel is so far below Hilton Brands standard. I am pretty flexible and can deal with most things but not dirty bedding. One of my sheets had something on it (don't even want to think about what it was). My parents pillow case we are hoping was rust not blood. When we pulled out the pull out for my son it had so much dirt on the sheets that if felt like someone dumped sand on it. If it was just the pull out that was dirty I would understand but  I called downstairs and asked it they could make sure all of our bedding was changed including the pull out and we came back to the same dirty sheets on the pull out and they took more dirty towels etc. than they left, leaving us with 3 towels, and 1 wash cloth for 4

While visiting new great granddaughter the Embassy Suite Hitel was minutes from the hospital. It was nice family to come and relax. The hotel was great and staff is accommodating and friendly. Would absolutely stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We're glad you and your family could enjoy our newly renovated suites. We hope to see you soon and congratulations on your new great granddaughter!

Summary: Average hotel, lacking in cleanliness.  The pillowcases were dirty, makes you wonder what else was dirty.  They did not have linen for the pullout sleeper.  The bathroom was only accessible through the bedroom.  The refrigerator was not cold (could not adjust the temp).

Summary Heading: The only thing I would change would be the location.
Summary: I read lots of reviews and knew in advance about the scrapyard which is a huge eye sore. As we drove up at about 1 am on a Friday night the nightclub in the parking lot was still very crowded. There was a bar fight outside and security had the parking lot coned off to "direct traffic" as the entire parking lot was full. Upon entering the hotel we were warmly greeted and check in was a breeze. The hotel itself is simply beautiful. Rooms are on par with every other Embassy I've stayed at although I feel the need to mention the bathrooms are very tiny. The 1st night of our 7 night stay there were no handicap accessible rooms available however the staff graciously moved all our stuff to 1 the next morning. So to sum everything up, the hotel and staff are great, the location sucks,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Jessica! We're glad our newly renovated hotel and wonderful staff could make up for our surroundings. We hope to see you in the near future. Thank you for your valued business.

Summary: Two rooms in two nights, both smelled. Upon entering the 1st room, we noticed a strong order of mold/mildew. When the clerk called to ask how the room was we complained about the smell. They apologized and within a few minutes, a hotel maintenance person came to the room to suggest we turn on the fan. The fan was already on. A few minutes later, a room service person came to the room to spray air freshener, which helped cover the smell slightly. We left the room for a few hours, returning late. Upon our return the room still smelled. Since we were tired, we choose not to request a new room. After waking up during the night with severe allergies (I'm allergic to mold & mildew) we decided we would request a new room for our 2nd night. The staff were very understanding and

The hotel was very nice and I liked the room layout. Breakfast was great. Got eggs cooked to order and the layout was spread out to avoid crowding in areas. The family loved this hotel and it had a nice indoor pool. I would definitely recommend to anyone not just families.

It had been more than two decades since my last stay at this hotel. It has recently been remodeled so I thought it would be nice to give another try. We had been staying at hotels closer to Disneyland. But, we got a great rate and decided to take a chance. And, it was well worth it. Although it may not be as nice as some newer properties, the remodeled room was nice and comfortable. We enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and manager's reception. Since we always have a car, transportation to the park wasn't a problem. And, they have a shuttle to Disneyland.  However, the best part for me was NO ADDED FEES! When you stay at hotels close to Disneyland there is this resort area fee. And, most of those hotels charge for parking. And, to make matters worse, the hotel tax is added to

Summary Heading: Embassy Suites lost their Mojo on this one!
Summary: Typically Embasy has acceptable places, this one not so much! If you have any in room service repairs as a place of this age typically would, do not expect prompt service! Even in a state of drought they would not come fix my water valve that stuck on for two and a half hours! It waisted hundreds of gallons of water as well as it was all hot water other guests probably needed!

Rest room needed to  be scrubbed a lot better. The room smelled like mold and mildew. The air conditioner was down. Room needs to be updated. Too far from Disneyland. They charged $5 per person for shuttle bus.  The best was the FOOD and the food staff.

You will like this hotel if your expectations are very, very low (think Bate's Motel or an old road side motel).  However, if you are like me that want air conditioning that works when it's 93 degrees outside, or elevators that aren't under repair when you are on a higher floor, or a quiet place to sleep (hotel shares a parking lot with a night club that plays loud music until 1 am, or clean environment this place isn't for you.  What's happened to the Embassy brand?  It used to mean something.  Yikes! Yike! Yikes!

I'm dissatisfied with the fridge leak and the smell of the room. However the evening reception and complimentary breakfast were nice. The shuttle to Disneyland was helpful also. Wish there was n outdoor pool

Of all my stays (3days here) at a Hilton hotel's,Embassy Anaheim North was probably the worst.  I normally would highly recommend Hilton...but not this one.  Room had a bad smell, twice I had to asked to clean my room of which the last night they forgot. Believe me Im not a complainer, but when mama isn't happy...no one is happy...my wife was not a happy camper....
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations, Arthur. We greatly appreciate your feedback and will be sure to address each issue. We hope you will give us another opportunity to provide you with excellent service.

Summary: This is an older hotel and it does look okay from the outside.  However, the inside is what counts.  We walked into the the hotel to check-in.  The first thing I noticed was fingerprints all over the glass doors.(The dirty windows can also be seen on elevators as well)  The check-in process was relatively easy and painless.  We went to our room and noticed the smoke alarm was hanging from the wall, the light switches were filthy, thick scratches on the tv, stains on the curtain, dust on the ceiling, etc.  We were also swarmed by mosquitoes when we opened the door to the balcony.  So, I called downstairs to change rooms.  Much to my dismay, the other room had the same issues as the previous room that we were given.  In addition, there was a weird odor, stains on the sofa, and a
Manager Response: We are terribly sorry to hear that there were so many challenges with your recent stay and that we did not meet your expectations. Considering that our guestrooms were recently completely remodeled we were surprised to hear hear this. Regardless, I assure you that we will take all of your feedback seriously. Thank you again for your feedback!

Summary: We like the Embassy suites because of the large living room and bedrooms. We never feel cramp in this hotel. We brought our daughters for a Disneyland trip. (They are 23 & 24) The breakfast is very good with a large selection. The nightly reception could use some help! It was pretty picked over and not maintained at 6:30 pm. The bartender was a bit overwhelmed too. The restaurant was good and price reasonable for a hotel.  The BEST bed ever too. Super comfy!!!! Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you and your family had such a great experience while staying with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our newly renovated guestrooms and our complimentary breakfast. Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business.

Summary: Please ask to check your room before unpacking. I had major mold in the bathroom and the tub facuet leaked. My issues were not address, during this stay as the management didn't seem to care! Not a good location for a family, as there is a Gentlemen's club that you share the same parking lot with. So there are a lot of men standing round the hotel smoking cigarettes. Scary if you are walking in the hotel at night with children.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that your recent stay was not up to your expectations. We do take our feedback seriously and use it as a training opportunity to better serve our guests. We also apologize for the Latin nightclub. Safety is a priority here and we will take your concerns into consideration.

Summary: Prior to booking this Embassy Suites location I read all of the most recent reviews.  The reviews were a 50/50 mix of yay or nae.  So as I typically do is continue with my booking, because of the content of why people disliked a particular hotel was a bit petty and generally means the hotel is still a nice place to stay.  In this case the hotel wasn't bad, but definitely not what a person that knows about the best of Embassy Suites. Most Hilton Honors Gold or Platinum members wouldn't be thrilled with this location.   I changed rooms twice.  The first run had a smell of old stinky socks.  Still giving the hotel the benefit of the doubt I went on to the next one. We stayed here for two nights and the air conditioner in the room is preset by the hotel no matter what you think you
Manager Response: Thank you for your GREAT feedback! We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your concerns. Thank you for your valued business!

Summary: Overall very good. The staff was excellent.  Breakfast staff was great.  The faculty was comfortable but the rooms a bit dated and in need of repair.  Easy access to the main roads year quiet room for a good nights rest.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear our staff was able to accommodate you so well. Thank you for your delightful feedback and for your valued business.

Summary: Great hotel location. Rooms were spacious and the beds were comfy. Evening reception had great drink options. The only drawback was the outside noise that could affect a light sleeper but I found ear plugs were a great solution. Really enjoyed the cooked to order breakfast and variety of items.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us while traveling for graduation weekend. We're glad you were able to take advantage of our evening manager's reception and complimentary breakfast. Thank you for your feedback and congratulations on the graduation!

Summary: Excellent hotel for staying at Disneyland.  Great shuttle service to and from Disneyland. Great breakfast.  Great staff.  Grandkids enjoyed the swimming pool. Rooms were spacious and clean.  Not a lot of options for evening meals around hotel but restaurant had excellent food.  really enjoyed the philly steak sandwich.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I'm glad to hear you received excellent service during your recent stay! We are also happy to hear you enjoyed the newly renovated suites and the delicious offerings from our Bistro. Thank you for your valued business.

Summary: An older hotel with a fresh coat of paint is still an older hotel. Room furnishings are still from the 80's. Embassy suites used to have water running in the atrium garden area giving a pleasant sound but not this hotel. everything is dated in my opinion.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty to the Hilton Family of brands. Considering our guestrooms public spaces were just completely remodeled we were surprised to hear this feedback. We will definitely take your feedback into consideration as we are continuously looking to improve our guest experience. Thank you.

Summary: I don't always take the time to write a review but this Embassy Suites exceeded my expectations in all areas and so I felt compelled. First of all, the service was impeccable!   I am not used to EVERY SINGLE STAFF PERSON greeting me warmly with a sweet sincere smile and kind greeting.  Well done, management!  I truly felt welcome.    The breakfast was excellent!  Made to order omelettes, and every other breakfast food imaginable.   The whole family was excited about their food choices.    I decor and atmosphere were top notch.  I loved the feel of the hotel.  I stepped inside and immediately felt like I was somewhere special.  The beds and pillows were so comfortable.  I felt like I was sleeping on a cloud.    I would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you and your family had such a great experience while staying with us! Our Team takes pride in delivering detailed and special service and I am so happy to hear that you were able to see and enjoy this first hand. We thank you for this wonderful feedback and for your valued business. We hope to see you in the near future!

Summary Heading: Good place to stay. Nice hotel.
Summary: The hotel is nice and newly remodeled. The evening social hour is nice, but would have been better with different or expanded food items. The room was clean. Would have been nice to have a tub though. Pool and sauna area is great. About 10 mins to disney with traffic. Front desk was ok, but not what I'm used to with embassy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your GREAT feedback! We are happy to hear you enjoyed the newly renovated suites and pool area. We truly feel "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your valued business!

Summary: Unfortunately, I have to rate this visit as horrible.  This is the second time that I stayed in the hotel and both times were subpar.  The rooms had a damp, mildew type smell which I encountered on the first visit.  However, on the second visit, not only did I experience the smell again, but this time there were small bugs all over the bathroom and on the mirrored counter area in the sleeping area.  Needless to say, I will never stay at this location again.  The representative was very accommodating when I showed him the pictures of the bugs.  However, this doesn't remove the damage.
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations again and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished. This is certainly not our goal as we are in the process of further enhancing our Hotel for our guests. We will make sure to further investigate the issues you brought up and will work to make sure future guests do not have the same experience. Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: I'm a loyal Hilton honors member and I've always loved embassy suites among the Hilton family brands. This stay is pretty disappointing. The parking area did not seem safe even with a few visible security roaming around. The decor is a bit dated.  The toilet paper holders don't hold the toilet paper rolls in place. There was stale bath water in the tub and the faucet was not even dripping so I'm pretty sure it was from someone else who had stayed previously. Gross! I was going to let it pass but when I took a shower, the hot water kept going in and out and the water would just turn icy cold every few minutes or so for about 30 seconds at a time. They sent someone up to fix it, but my back already hurts from the icy cold water that had hit me a few times whilst taking a shower.
Manager Response: We are sincerely sorry that your recent stay was not up to your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished. We greatly appreciate your feedback. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We take your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for future improvement.

Summary Heading: Great stay at Embassy Suites Anaheim North
Summary: I stayed here recently on business for 3 days.  The staff was great but I enjoyed most was the soft bed, omlet breakfast, and free cocktails in the evening!  The staff also always greeted me with a smile and made sure I was enjoying my stay.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim North while traveling on business, Jensen! It sounds like it was a successful trip for you and this makes us glad. Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business! We hope to see you soon.

Summary: little bit like house arrest...but if your goal is to visit Disneyland then this is your stop.  From steamed breakfast to microwaved lunch and dinner. drip coffee and white sugar.  soak it up... like a box in the middle of a parking lot.  our uber driver couldn't even find it.  -lfjfsfj;lfjslffjjsfkdflksjfowfndflvmvlslkfjlsflmvkldvnsllmslfmsf-----dsfjsdjflsjflsjfl lsfjlsjf fj sjfdjlskf flfjlsj lfjslfjls flsfjlsf  lsjfflkdsjflsjflsdjflf jlkfj sljffl fdjflkfjslf lfjfls f lkflkjflksfjl fjflks fslkf lskdkjflsfjl flkjflksjflj lj lfjlj lksjflksj----

Stood 4 nights, with my wife and 3 toddlers. Rooms very spacious. Staff is friendly and courteous. Every encounter with them, even passing them by, they would smile and say hello. Fridge, even with small freezer section, was a plus and helped keep our water and other goodies cold while inside Disneyland. Check in/Check out was a breeze. 12pm checkout was great, as we did not feel rushed to wake up and leave right away. Breakfast was perfect for my wife and I. We had freshly made omelettes each day. Also, the first morning was belgian waffles, then the next 2 days were french toast sticks, and the last day was regular waffles.Bacon and sausage were good too.  Kids loved the french toast sticks! Saw people take the breakfast up their room, we just decided to stay down and eat.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you and your family had a such a great experience while staying at the Embassy Suites Anaheim North, Mike! Thank you for the delightful feedback. We are very proud of our complimentary breakfast offerings, and are glad you were able to take full advantage. We look forward to seeing you and your family again in the not too distant future.

Summary: Our family stayed here during the remodel and the stay was okay.  This past May we returned and were very satisfied with our stay.  Our room was very roomy.  Breakfast was amazing as always.  My children enjoyed the pool and hot tub.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you and your family had such a great experience while staying with us! Thank you for your delightful feedback and for your valued business!

Summary Heading: not the best embassy suites as others i've stayed at
Summary: location is pretty random even though it's close to many attractions such as Disneyland and Anaheim Packing District.  The lobby and the hotel rooms all seem pretty new -- looks like they remodeled. The walls and outside looks a bit rundown though. Overall the hotel is okay. There were 4 adults and 1 baby with us. The grandparents slept in the king size bed while, my husband, daughter and i slept in the sofa bed. The sofa bed squeaked A LOT and the blankets that they provided were not thick enough to keep us warm.   The breakfast was terrible. the sausages were bad, the oatmeal weren't warm enough, omelette station was opened late. this was the saddest breakfast out of the all the embassy suites i've been to
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished. This is certainly not our goal as we are in the process of enhancing our Hotel for our guests. I assure you that we will take all of your feedback seriously and will use this as opportunity to re-evaluate our guest needs for future improvement. We hope you will consider staying with us again so we can show you what our Hotel is truly made of. Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: I'm a loyal HHonors guy.  I stay over 100 nights a year.  The hotel staff here is great and the facility is starting a renovation/upgrade.  Very accommodating staff, but the breakfast was one of the weakest I've seen in a long time.  You couldn't order a pancake and they offered some dried out little waffle squares one morning or french toast sticks another.  Felt more like a Hampton Inn breakfast.  I know this is near Disney, but I'm a business traveler and won't make the mistake of staying near Disney again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your breakfast experience. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest's experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travel brings you to our area.

Summary: Once again Embassy Suites has satisfied!  The front desk attendants were very friendly, helpful and accommodating.  We are Hilton Honors members and were able to choose our room online the day before our arrival.  Room 738 is a nice location, we watched the Disneyland fireworks from our room. The night club across the parking lot was a little noisy, however, nothing that a little white noise wouldn't drown out.    As with our other Embassy Suite stays, the mattresses are very comfortable and we slept great.    We liked the location and the fact that we didn't have to pay for parking!  The hotel was a short drive from John Wayne/Orange County Airport and a reasonable distance from Knotts Berry Farm & Disneyland.  The breakfasts were very nice, a good variety to choose from.  The
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us, Karen! It sounds like it was a successful weekend getaway. Our team takes pride in delivering special and thoughtful srvice and we are so glad to hear that you were able to see and enjoy this firsthand. Thank you for your valued feedback and business!

Summary: Average Embassy Suites I will agree with another contributor, it's not newly renovated, shows wear outside of the common areas.  My wife forgot a ring on the bed, which was visible. I know it was her fault but I am pretty sure housekeeping saw it. We called as soon as she knew it was missing  about an hour and we were too far to return. We did not hear back.  It is the only negative aspect of this stay. It is a 15-20 min distance via car to Disneyland or shuttle, right off the freeway. But, there is nothing else around.

We like to stay at this Embassy Suites for many reasons: it is always clean and quiet, and getting to Disneyland is a breeze. There is a dedicated shuttle that gets you to and fro and it is never overcrowded like the shuttles from the hotels clustered around Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Mary! We are so glad to hear you found your recent stay with us enjoyable and convenient. We hope to see you again in the near future. Again, thank you for your feedback and your valued business.

Summary Heading: Avegage stay in an Embassy Suites Hotel
Summary: The hotel is advertised as newly renovated. Either they aren't finished yet or their contractor didn't do A very good job carpet and paint could use some work. The hotel was clean.  It would be nice if the hotel staff would worn you that there is a large group kids so that you go down to breakfast early or wait in long lines
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: I recommend staying at the Embassy Suites North in Anaheim. It is conveniently located and they just underwent a nice remodel. Very good staff and rooms are clean and well appointed. The fitness room equipment needs some attention however. There is a nice walking / running path just across the river from the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great feedback, Eric! We are glad to hear you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms. We will be sure to take your comments regarding the fitness center under consideration as we are continually working to improve our guest experience. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Don't get lured by this hotel claim of renovated room.  It is still old and out of date with terrible room smell.  Housekeeping don't come unless you call them.  The shampoo, lotion, conditioner and soap were some cheap generic version.  Housekeeping does not change dirty bedsheet and pillowcase unless you force them to do so.  Be aware of dirty pool water, I got bacterial skin infection by just using their pool once.  Also, do not eat their danish and muffin unless you like to enjoy eating together with flies.
Manager Response: I am sincerely sorry to hear that your recent stay was not up to your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished. We do take our guest feedback very seriously and use it as a training opportunity to better serve our guests. We have made note of each concern you have mentioned and will be sure to address each department. We hope that you will consider staying with us again in the future.

Summary: The hotel was clean but 20 minutes to get to Disneyland and then it wasn't until we got off the shuttle they told us the last shuttle was 9:30 and we were late by 5 minutes after the fireworks so had to take a cab.  Many other hotel shuttles were still arriving.  Really not impressed with that.  The hotel staff were great and breakfast was fantastic.  Also the pool was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the hotel with exception to the Anaheim Transit Shuttle service. We are sorry if this caused any inconvenience to you. Thank you for your valued business and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I had a great experience with great staff, and ambiance. I highly recommend this hotel. The pool is inside, the breakfast is amazing, and therea complimentary srinks and snacks. Family friendly with big suites. My children loved it.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim North! It sounds like it was a successful trip for your family. Thank you for you feedback and your valued business! Looking forward to seeing you again on your next trip.

Summary: We have always had great experiences with Embassy Hotels.  The beds are comfortable, pillows are great, hotels are kept very clean, staff is friendly and helpful and the breakfast is wonderful and has something for everyone.  When you factor the free breakfast and evening reception into the price, it is a great value!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, Sheila. I'm glad to hear you received excellent service during your recent stay! I am also happy to hear that you were comfortable in our newly renovated suites. We do believe we offer a great value here and we are glad you have found Embassy Hotels to be just as valuable. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great Hotel just jump on the ART to make it to disneyland then make sure to come back to relax and get some drinks for happy hour then back to disney we always stay here when we visit disney. The breakfast buffet is amazing as well don't miss it
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I'm glad to hear you could take advantage of all our Hotel has to offer. It is also wonderful to hear that you receive excellent service every time you visit Disney. Thank you for your valued business.

Summary: My family and I booked her for our trip to Disneyland. So we stood here for 4 nights.   The breakfast was delicious. Full service- made to order breakfast. There was donuts, bagels, cereals, fruits, yogurts, juices, milk, coffee, toast, condiments, but also egg, bacon, sausage, potatoes. And if you wanted a certain sort of egg/omelet the chef was there to make it for you.   The shuttle to Disneyland was good. The driver took a longer route than my gps suggested. the roads he drove on were bumpy and cracked so bags, strollers, and people were hopping around.   The pool at the hotel was great. Smaller than we thought. 4 families fit fine inside.  But it's clean and indoor so it's great in all weather or time of day.   In the evening the hotel offered free refreshments and a light
Manager Response: We are so delighted to read a review such as yours, Angie L. We could not be happier to hear that not only did you enjoy our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and manager's reception, but that our Front Desk staff treated you as "their #1 guest".  Thank you for your feedback and valued business. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Our stay was great the hotel was beautiful....my 11 year old son is standing here telling me to write that he had a great time and loved the hotel and hotel staff!! My family had a great experience here!! The staff was very friendly, the breakfast was fantastic, we all enjoyed the evening reception one evening, the indoor pool and spa were a great way to end the evening!! The rooms were comfortable and well kept.  We will definitely be back in the future!  Thank you!!
Manager Response: We are just thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us  and that our Hotel Team delivered on our promise yet again to provide an excellent experience all around. We take great pride in our Hotel and are glad you and your 11 year old son were able to take advantage of all we have to offer. We can't wait to see you both again!

Summary: We stay here often and love this hotel. The breakfast here cant be beat. Other hotels offer pastries, toast, cold cereals etc. Embassy offers cooked to order hot breakfast with much more. Incase you like pastries dont worry they still have them. Great room sizes for larger families!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay, Ganessa C! We take great pride in our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and we're glad you were able to take advantage of it. Thank you for your feedback and your valued business.

Summary: Embassy Suites is my preferred hotel. Great atmosphere, friendly and accommodating staff. Spacious and quiet rooms. Great for families. This particular hotel was close to freeway, restaurants, shopping and amusement parks.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you had such a great experience while staying with us. Thank you for your delightful feedback and for your valued business.

Summary Heading: Second Visit with More in the Future
Summary: Great deal. Wonderful friendly staff. Love the breakfast and evening reception. Also appreciate the ease of getting to and from Disneyland on the ART bus for a minimal fee. This was our second stay in two years and we will definitely be returning.
Manager Response: We are just thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our Team was so hospitable with you and your family! Our Team takes great pride in the Hotel and truly enjoys connecting with our guests. Thank you for your feedback and your valued business! See you in the future!

Summary: I highly recommend this location to anyone on business or leisure.  You will enjoy the accommodations and professionalism of the staff.  The recent remodel of the hotel is very inviting to guests. This location is located near Disneyland and has a shuttle to ensure that you can get there on time and safe.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, Ernest G! I'm glad to hear you received excellent service during your recent stay. We are also happy to hear that our recent remodel felt welcoming and you were able to take advantage of our ART shuttle. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great stay and hotel was A+. From the staff to the rooms everything was well kept. The hospitality was excellent and I was given excellent service while staying at this location. I will be sure to stay again.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you found your trip to be an "A+", Tim! We pride ourselves in making sure excellent service is the only service our guests receive. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located right off the 91 freeway about 15 minutes from Disneyland. There is another ES closer to Disney, so if you don't mind being a little further away, it's a good value. The hotel is atrium style with doors to the rooms facing an interior atrium courtyard vs. long hallways. It feels safer because you can see people walking around so there isn't the feeling that anyone is lurking in the hallways. The downside is that you may have to keep the curtains closed if people are walking by your room unless you don't mind people peering into your room.   The lobby and public space is spacious, light and airy. A very nice full-breakfast buffet is included as with all Embassy Suites and the cook-to-order omelette station is a plus. The evening cocktail hour
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you found our property a great value for families and took advantage of all we have to offer. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider any issues, though slight, you may have found. Thank you for your valued business!

Summary: My sheets were not changed in my room after my first night, when I came back from a long day at Disneyland I found a dead fly on my bed I called down to the front desk and they sent a set of sheets up I guest that was there way of telling me "change them yourself". I didn't have a plate in my microwave I called down the first night and didn't get it finally they bought it up the second night around 10!!!
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished. This is certainly not our goal and for this we do apologize. Rest assured that we have looked into each and every item that you mentioned and have made adjustments where applicable. We take your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement.

Summary: The lobby and common areas of the hotel are recently renovated and are pretty decent.  The rooms however requires renovation. They are pretty old and smells like wet carpet.  Bathroom fixtures are old as well and have missing hooks for hanging clothes. The door locks doesnt work well as well.  May it it was just my room, but it had a water leakage from the sink in the room above us and we had to hop and enter the bed room as the carpet at the entrance was soggy.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We have taken note of the issues you found with your room and are making sure they are addressed. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: Very nice hotel in a good location. The atrium was beautiful and the rooms spacious. The breakfast that is served in the morning are the greatest compare to the other complimentary breakfast that are served throughout the industry.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, Bill. I'm glad to hear you enjoyed our recently renovated hotel and wonderful complimentary breakfast. Looking forward to seeing you again next time.

Summary: Our family stayed at this hotel when we visited Disneyland.  The staff is amazing and the hotel is a convenient drive from Disneyland (the hotel also offers a shuttle service).  The complimentary breakfast is the best!  The beds are comfortable and the hotel is clean.
Manager Response: We are just thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our Team was so hospitable with you and your family. Our Team takes great pride in the Hotel and all it has to offer. Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business!

Summary Heading: Spacious rooms for very fair price
Summary: Very spacious rooms, clean, breakfast awesome with made to order omelettes (included in price) & friendly kitchen staff, large scenic eating area, pool & hot tub. We signed up for rewards which included free wifi. Only complaint was we could hear voices early in morning through duct work (ventilation system), which woke us up early. Also loved the late check out (noon)
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I'm glad you were able to take advantage of all our hotel has to offer during your recent stay! We are sorry to hear the room was not as quiet as you would have liked, and will take your review into consideration as we are constantly working to improve our services. Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business!

Summary: We stayed here for our anniversary and did not experience any issues. We also recently stayed at the Embassy Suites on State College Blvd. we prefer this property. The Frontera property is better maintained, has free parking that isn't overflowing the designated lot, is quieter, beds are more comfortable, and the indoor pool is much nicer (and bigger). If you are headed to Disney, the only drawback is that it is farther away. The ART shuttle is has a stop here which is nice, but it is only once per hour, so plan accordingly or use a service like Huber.

Summary Heading: Nice Clean hotel away from the Disney Crowd
Summary: Had a pleasant stay during our college visits.  This hotel offers very spacious, clean and quiet rooms.    It offers many amenities including indoor pool, jacuzzi and gym.  The manmade indoor garden, pond, variety of trees, small bridge and water fall adds additional tranquility and peace to your mind.  Very good!

We love staying at Embassy suites.  A couple of pointers, When you go down to get breakfast, try to avoid the high traffic times. If you go during those times, it will be hard to find a seat, it is very crowded, and  they run out of different foods faster than they can restock them. It is worth it to get down there 20 minutes earlier. The evening reception is fabulous. I love the addition of healthier options, as well as  The chips and salsa, goldfish, garhdettos, Etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review, we are so glad to hear that you love staying with us! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our evening reception. Looking forward to your family's next visit to Anaheim.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Perfect place to stay for a trip to Disney. We really enjoyed everything! Great breakfast, friendly and helpful staff. My kids loved the pool. We loved the complimentary drinks and appetizers! Great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Amy,  Thank you for your excellent review. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed everything and had a great stay. We look forward to your next stay while visiting Disneyland.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Older room. Cobwebs in corners. Musty smell in room.   Breakfast was good. Good selection. Well-kept.   Metal recycling next door on one side, freeway on another, and nightclub on a third. I thought it was a strip club when I approached.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: We were travelling to Anaheim for a basketball tournament so we booked as a group. Another member of our party had already checked in and gotten their room. Upon our arrival at 2pm, our room was not ready yet so the front desk gave us a claim check for our bags/belongings, gave us some good recommendations for lunch and said our room would be ready in 45 minutes. No problem!! The location in Old Town Orange was just what we needed after a long morning of driving.  We arrived back at the hotel at 4pm and our room was still not ready...umm, what? There was a shift change in the interim and the poor kid had no idea what was going on. We eventually got our room, which had already been assigned to someone else so I had to call the front desk to come pick up the card and flowers meant

We stayed here for 4 nights for a Disneyland trip. Overall it's a great place. A little further away than I thought it was but not bad, maybe 30 minute drive to the park. Breakfast and Manager's Reception were both very awesome. Had to ask for washcloths and towels twice during the 4 nights, never left enough for the 5 of us. Would stay again, nice queen beds and clean rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our cooked-to-order breakfast and Evening Reception. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Unfortunately, this stay is by far the worst experience I have had in an Embassy Suites. Same feed back was sent to guest service manager with no response..   Here are my positive and negative feedback from this stay. Positive: 1. Beautiful lobby, it looks fresh and modern but still exhibit warm. 2. Cooked to order breakfast is very good, an Embassy Suites staple. 3. New pillows, very comfortable.  Negative: 1. Need to change room 3 times. First, room 618, we found a dirty hand towel in the room by the door. Two dirty spots on the sofa bed. I immediately requested a room change and we were moved to room 310. Well, not any better, the carpet is dirty, dust balls on places. Again, I requested a room change and we were moved to room 205. We were hoping 3rd time is a charm but it
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished. This is certainly not our goal and for this we do apologize. Rest assured that we have looked into each and every item that you mentioned and have made adjustments where applicable. We take your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: we had great expectations, and most of them were not met.  This is after all an embassy suites, right.  Our toilet did not flush right, our tub leaked water, the screen door on the balcony was off and falling over the railing, we were on the side with the metal recycling plant out our window which operated 12 hours a day.  My advice get a room on the other side of the hotel and check all the mechanicals before you agree to stay in the room they give you, oh and check for bed bugs.
Manager Response: Dear Todd,  Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Stayed here for one night on business.  The hotel appears a bit old and is out in the sticks, but the rooms were clean and well maintained.  Staff was excellent.  No issues with the typical Embassy Suites breakfast.  All in all, this is a good place to stay if you are on business.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you had a great experience during your stay while traveling on business. Thank you for your delightful feedback! We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Stayed here because of a wedding at the Nixon library. Overall Friendly staff,great service...nice rooms. Will definitely come back when in Anaheim. And will recommend to friends to book here for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your GREAT review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us while in town for a wedding at the Nixon Library. Lastly, we appreciate that you will be recommending us to your friends. We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: I stayed at the Embassy Suites Central times. This time was no different than the last time. I will continue recommending the Embassy Suites To my co-workers and my friends. I thank you for my stay.I took a good friend of mine and her two daughters. The two girls went to Disneyland all day And in the morning they went to the swimming pool And they had so much fun. Oh what a way to end a Disneyland trip With an Embassy Suites Indoor swimming pool In the morning. What a way to end a trip.
Manager Response: Dear Eddie,  Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us while visiting Disneyland. Thank you for continuing to recommend our hotel to your co-workers and friends.  Sincerely,  Caterina Y.

Summary: Absolutely professional staff amazing rooms and the inside lobby area is amazing. If you're looking for a place to go and need a place to stay this is a located in a very good area with lots of attractions nearby.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you had such a great experience while staying with us. Thank you for your delightful feedback and for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: By far not our favorite Embassy Suites. Rooms smell like cigarette smoke so bad. The evening reception was nice but had to move our family at 10pm in order to sleep. The night club that shares the same lot was not a good thing either. So bummed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about hotel under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Sincerely,  Caterina Y.

Summary: My family of four stayed here. While we have an apartment in LA, we thought it would be nice to spend the night close to California Adventure.   Hotel staff was highly accommodating. They allowed us to check in early. The day we left we realized my husband left his personal pillow at the hotel. Staff graciously found it and had it ready for us, wrapped in a plastic bag.  The swimming pool was great. Expect a fair number of families as this is a popular Disney destination. The gym was fine.  Standard utilitarian equipment.   We ate dinner at the hotel restaurant and the food was great. The free breakfast was an unexpected highlight. They have everything!  Our room was clean, comfortable and spacious. I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We're glad to hear that our staff was highly accommodating during your recent stay! We are also happy to hear that you were comfortable in our newly renovated suites. More importantly - we truly appreciate you recommending our hotel! We hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Room was good size and comfortable. No view really. Close to disney and easy freeway access. No bathtub though they do have a restaurant and room service. Pool was pretty cold. Breakfast ended to early 9a on weekdays.
Manager Response: Dear Laurie,  Thank you for your review, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed one of our newly renovated guestroom suites. We're sorry to hear that your room did not have a bathtub considering that most of our guestrooms suites have rooms equipped with bathtubs. We appreciate your feedback about the pool and will take that into consideration as we are continuously trying to improve our guest experience.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: Not bad Hotel..expect a lot of families with kids
Summary: Hotel wasn't too bad. Easy access to freeways. A lot of families with small children as Disneyland is right down the street. Had the usual managers reception in the evenings with popcorn and chips and the bartenders are busy but keep the drinks flowing.   Breakfasts are pretty good, the cook to order omelets are good and filling. Coffee was ok...also had in room coffee maker and I always had 2 decaf and 1 regular (really??) Who drinks decaf?  Ate once at the restaurant and had a burger...was good but the garlic parmesan fries rocked.   Room left a little to be desired. The bed was pretty soft and a little uncomfortable but nothing that was to complain about. What was annoying was there was some kind of motor that had a bad berring as all night I could hear it rather loudly...I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Our family had a Great experience in the Anaheim North ES. After a 7.5 hr trip from Sacto, a 4 hr 1st Fontana NASCAR Experience, our 7th Floor Rm was Very Comfortable & Quiet. We Slept soundedly and arose to a Hearty, Hot Breakfast to start our CSU Fullerton Tour.
Manager Response: Dear Wayne,  Thank you for your GREAT review! We are happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed our hotel and woke up to a hearty, hot breakfast. We look forward to seeing you again to your next visit to Anaheim.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: Family Friendly Home away from Home
Summary: The minute you walk in the door the staff is friendly and very accommodating.  I am a returning visitor to this hotel and would recommend it to anyone visiting Disneyland with kids.  It is a comfortable and safe place for the children.  The breakfast and evening reception was a wonderful.  The cleanliness of the grounds was awesome.  The kids loved the pool as well.
Manager Response: Dear Elaine,  Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you and your family had such a great experience while staying at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim North. Thank you for your delightful feedback! We look forward to seeing you and your family again in the not too distant future.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Do not go if there is a student music competition going on! They allow the students to practice until after midnight and start again before 6AM. The students are rude also. I had four people in the suite and had to ask EVERYDAY for towels for four people. Room was fine, breakfast OK. Happy hour sure isn't what it used to be, except the drinks are free. About 20 minutes from Disneyland if you use ART.
Manager Response: Dear Martha,  Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our service under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Great Stay. Rooms were clean and fair sized. The buses to Disney ran frequently and were not very expensive. Breakfast was good and the waterfall and lion perched atop were entertaining to the kids. There was also a happy hour that was a nice surprise for mom & dad :)

Reserved one room with two queen beds and one room with a king bed.  I was assigned two rooms with king beds.  When I spoke to the front desk, I was told that the hotel was overbooked and that there was nothing that they could do to get me one room with the two queen beds that I reserved.  The front desk said that he could have a cot sent up so that we could put the kids in the same room as the bed so that the kids did not have to sleep on the sofa bed, which was in a different room, by themselves.  We checked into two rooms with king beds.  The front desk never brought up the cot!  The website said that this hotel had recently completed renovations, however, when I went to use the restroom, there was water all over the toilet and floor.  I was told that the room had a leak in
Manager Response: Dear Yvonne,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you had challenges during your recent stay with us. We take your comments very seriously and will use your feedback as a training opportunity.   Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: This was my first E.S years ago and my favorite!
Summary: This beautiful Embassy suites was my first one years ago text started a lifetime Love affair and I go back to this one every chance I get . I love the feeling of walking in and That open courtyard , The breakfast is amazing the People are great the koi fish swimming in the courtyard pond it just brings about the very special feeling within yourself .
Manager Response: Dear Justin,  We are just thrilled to hear that we are your FAVORITE Embassy Suites. It brings us great pleasure to hear that you have a great feeling when you walk into our courtyard and that our staff provided you with great service. Thank you for your review and we can't wait until your next visit to Anaheim.  Thank you, Caterina Y.

Summary: The room was not equipped with an ironing board, just the iron (738). We waited over 55 minutes to get the board. The room was poorly maintained during our 3 night stay. Beds were sloppily made and the room was not vacuumed daily. Breakfast buffet was fine. Staff did a good job cleaning up dining tables. Pool was fun.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy,  We greatly appreciate your feedback. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and indoor pool. We are sorry to hear that our housekeeping service was below par. We will be sure to take your comments under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: I stayed here for work, but I also brought my family to go to Disneyland while I had meetings. It was a good location related to Disneyland (15 min), and the service, amenities, and room were typical of an Embassy Suites, which is very good. My only negative comment is that breakfast ended at 9am. If people are on vacation, which my wife and daughter were, they generally want to sleep later then 9. So they missed breakfast one morning. I would think they would offer breakfast until at least 10:30. So it's item that prevented me from giving this location 5 stars.
Manager Response: Dear Tom,  Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: This hotel has a great room set up and great free breakfast. We enjoyed the separate bedroom suite option as we had kids that were able to sleep in the living room area and play in that area while we slept.  The Disney Shuttle was awesome and very reliable.
Manager Response: Dear Mateo,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated guest suite and our Disney Shuttle. We hope to see you and your family again during your next Disneyland trip.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Had a very nice stay, enjoy traveling for business when you get such great service. Pleased to be able to get up and have breakfast and grab fruit to go. Staff always made sure the morning breakfast area was well stocked and clean.  The evening social hour was also very pleasant to attend.
Manager Response: Dear Helen,  We are thrilled to hear that you had very nice stay with us while traveling on business. It's great to hear that our morning staff made it easy for your to enjoy our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: As a Diamond member, I almost always stay at Hilton properties.  I have stayed at this hotel in the past with no issues, this visit was disappointing.  My room this trip had two double beds.  When I went to go to bed, I looked at one of the beds and it was covered with hairs.  The other that I slept in, was clean and bedding appeared fresh, but there was no way the other bed sheets, pillow cases, etc. had been changed.  Thankfully my family wasn't with on a family vacation.  Very disappointed in the housekeeping!
Manager Response: Dear James,  We are terribly sorry to hear that there were housekeeping challenges with your recent stay and that we did not meet your expectations. We always strive to provide excellent service and a great clean hotel for our guests.  We assure you that we will take all of your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement in the future. Thank you again for your feedback!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: This hotel was our favorite of the whole trip. It's so nice. Our suite was amazing. Rooms were clean and the fridge was super cold. We stayed here for 3 nights and so the cold fridge and the microwave were useful. Also the breakfast is yummy. Nice buffet and omelettes.
Manager Response: Dear Kindy,  We are just thrilled to hear that our hotel was your favorite part of your trip! Thank you for your delightful feedback! We look forward to seeing you again in the not too distant future.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: This hotel is quite nice for families. Roomy and quiet. It's atrium is really nice with a big pond and vegetation. That's where they serve the breakfast, which is busy, but good. Also, there's nothing on the hotel surroundings. Very family friendly, they offer a shuttle service to Disneyland, which reduces the trip to DL to about 30min door to door, comparing with the at least 1hour  driving+parking($18)+train to DL gate. The internal pool is big enough. The restaurant at the hotel is quite average, which is better than most eateries in Anaheim and their cartoon food.
Manager Response: Dear Marco,  We are just thrilled to hear that you and your family had enjoyed your recent stay with us while visiting Disneyland. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated suites and our indoor pool. Thank you again for your great review and we look forward to your family's next trip to Anaheim!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Our room was very warm the complete trip.  It cooled down towards the end of the day but in the night it would heat back up.  While the thermostat said 65, it was not 65 in the room.
