We were all three sweating in the middle of the night without blankets or sheets for cover.  It was consistent for both days.
Manager Response: Dear Belinda,  Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are sorry to hear that the temperature of your room was not to your liking. We truly feel that your "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Embassy suite is always a super good hotel,  here all the staff is very friendly and helpful.  Breakfast in the morning is good. Happy Hour at the bar is super. Restaurant is very good and service is good as well. Prices are good for this kind of hotel. A place that I really recommend if you are in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Andrea,  We are just thrilled to hear that you had enjoyed your recent stay with us. Thank you for recommending our hotel. We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Overall our stay was excellent, we did have a few issues with the housekeeping service provided in our room. and it wasn't completely taken care of, however, the service from the rest of the staff was amazing. and the housekeeping issue wasn't large enough for me to say I wouldn't go back.  I'd definitely give them a second chance
Manager Response: Dear Sasha,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that our staff had provided amazing service. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for an overnight business trip.  The staff was very nice, but the cleanliness of the room was subpar.  The table and counter tops were not clean, there was a cluster of dead bugs in the ceiling, the floors weren't clean, etc.  This was definitely not what I expected for this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Dalithia,  Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: The hotel has a very nice first floor. The lobby, bar, restaurant, pool, exercise room and breakfast area have all been remodeled in the last year. The pool is 3-5 feet deep and the hot tub seats 8. The exercise room has the basic exercise equipment.  The nightly reception is awesome and is highly attended. They serve base alcohol, sodas and juices along with an array of snack which change a little each day. The best part is this is all free and runs for two hours.   The restaurant is pricey and the food is average, but if you attended the reception the cost of the food does not feel so bad.  The breakfast area is great and the food is good. There are several food options and you can get omelets cooked to order. The staff is quick to clean up after you and you can eat as much as
Manager Response: Dear Corinne,  Thank you for your review in regards to your recent two week stay at our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary beverages during our Evening Reception. Also, our team takes pride in delivering GREAT service to our guests, we are glad to hear that you had experienced this first hand. We look forward to accommodating you during your next visit.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: The person checking us in was pleasant but spoke extremely low and it was hard to hear with the diesel bus that just arrived from Disneyland out front.  The doors were wide open to the hotel so you can imagine trying to hear someone speaking at a normal tone.  I checked in online the night before and there was option to request items upon arrival.  My items were not there when I arrived.  I asked for extra towels, pillows and blankets.  We had to call and ask for them.  No biggie.  The shower head was bent towards the wall and shower bar was there so it was an awkward position for my family to get under the water which had VERY POOR water pressure.  The tub was stopping up too. Gross!  My bedsheets had long hair in it....ugh.  Made me wonder if the sheets were changed from the
Manager Response: Dear Micheline,  Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: Awesome Room, Excellent breakfast, Kind and Courteous Staff
Summary: Every staff we came in contact with were exceptionally courteous and went out of their way in attentiveness.  From housekeeping, dining room, front desk, room service and bar staff. We realized that customer service is so sorely lacking these days that this hotel stood out as exceptional. The room is so comfortable and clean. Bed was a dream. We felt like we scored a huge deal. The breakfast is full, omelettes made to order and the happy hour was a welcome break. We would love to stay there again.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you  had such a great experience while staying at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim North. Thank you for your delightful feedback! We look forward to seeing you in the not too distant future.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: My family of 4 had a great stay in our suite during our visit to Disney and area.  Both my husband and I, and the kids loved the breakfast. I also appreciated that I could do some laundry to lighten my load going home and we all enjoyed the pool.  The parking lot was a little busy in the evenings, but with parking all around the building, we never had a problem finding a spot close to an entry.  The staff was also very friendly and kind with smiles on their faces.  We took advantage to the ART bus to Disney and found it to be quick and comfortable.  Other comments spoke of 30 minute trips, but we did not have a ride more than 20 minutes.
Manager Response: Dear Kimberley,  We are just thrilled to hear that your Family enjoyed your recent stay with us. It pleases us to hear that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and our indoor pool. Thank you for your feedback. Looking forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: location was excellent, close to Disney and my cousin's house .  loved the breakfast bar, you could have an omelet prepared in front of you.  Beautiful weather and the receptionist was very helpful.  I would stay here again. Beautiful scenery.
Manager Response: Dear Mary,  We are just thrilled to hear that our staff was very helpful and that you enjoyed our cooked to order breakfast.Thank you for your valued feedback!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Love this hotel for our trips to Disneyland.  Gets us away from the hustle and bustle and crowds in the evening.  This is our go-to hotel when we visit Southern California.  As a couple, with family, or booking several rooms, this hotel is very accommodating.  The shuttle to Disneyland allows us to park on arrival and not get back in the car until we leave.  Also, free parking!
Manager Response: Dear Darlene,  We are thrilled to hear that we are your go-to hotel while visiting Southern California and Disneyland. Thank you for your valued feedback and we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  Caterina Y.

Summary: I had a number of hotel options when I was making my travel plans, but I always lean toward Embassy Suites if they are available. The Embassy Suites Anaheim was an excellent stay, and the location could not have been more perfect. The atmosphere was very comfortable, and the staff could not have been more friendly. I was here on Business but it looked like they did a good job accommodating families who were here to visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Louis,  We are thrilled to hear that you had an excellent stay at our hotel while traveling on business! It gives us great pleasure to hear that you enjoyed the hotel's atmosphere and that our staff was very friendly. Thank you for your review and we can't wait to see you on your next business trip.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here.  The room was clean and the beds were comfortable, even the couch bed.  The morning breakfast is superb with everything you could want to eat, complete with omelets made to order.  The atmosphere is beautiful and relaxing.  We enjoyed the nightly cocktail time with snacks before we headed back to Disneyland.  The pool was clean and indoors, the kids enjoyed this very much.  Dad and I loved the hot tub.  The front desk was great.  Very accommodating.  We had a lot of trouble keeping key cards from getting erased, they were there with new ones right away, as well as extra towels and room service from the restaurant.  The shuttle to Disneyland was great.  It doesn't run from after 10am (Disneyland) to 3:30 Disneyland but that was ok, we planned
Manager Response: We are just thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us while visiting Disneyland. Our team takes great pride in exceeding our guests expectations. In addition we are happy to hear that you were able to relax in our indoor pool and enjoy our complimentary Evening Reception. Thank you again for your review. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Anaheim!
Summary: This place is awesome! The staff is great! My only complaint is the room temperature would get very hot in the early morning hour. This could in part be due to the non-porous blankets in combination with the lack of climate control (though this isn't often needed in Southern California)
Manager Response: Dear Sean,  We are so happy to hear that our hotel is awesome and that our staff is great! We appreciate your feedback about the room temperature and will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: The staff were all SUPER nice and helpful.    The rooms and food were consistent with other standard Embassy Suites hotels.   The only real problem is that the hotel is  by a highway and nothing is walkable. The ONLY thing close to the hotel is a nightclub, and the parking lot between that and the hotel gets very loud when the club closes at 2 AM on the weekends.
Manager Response: We are just thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our Team was super nice and helpful. Our Team takes great pride in the Hotel and truly enjoys connecting with our guests. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you again during your next stay!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Stayed for a week with family.  Clean and comfortable.  Breakfast was awesome.  Night time reception was a nice perk.  Staff was very friendly.  I would suggest not staying in the rooms that face the front of the hotel as the hotel faces a high end night club and it can probably get loud (although we never heard any noise, but were on the side facing the river).  Also, beware if you are a late arrival the club puts up cones in the parking lot to reserve spaces.  Even with the club ... this hotel is highly recommended.  The staff was friendly, the hotel was clean, the rooms were nice and the value was great.
Manager Response: Dear David,  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear you and your family had a great time during your recent stay. We are also happy to hear that you were comfortable in our newly renovated suites and enjoyed our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. Most importantly we truly appreciate you that you highly recommend our hotel. Looking forward to seeing you and your family again on your next trip to the area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: We were here for a week and it's very clean and the staff are very pleasant! The full breakfast is delicious with everything from cereal to made to order omeletts...a great start to a fun day sightseeing in California! And right off the freeway! Oh and I did I mention free happy hour every night ?!
Manager Response: We are just thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our Team was very pleasant. Our Team takes great pride in the Hotel and truly enjoys connecting with our guests. Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: No complaints at all. Rooms are clean and well maintained even though hotel is aged. Bed is very comfortable and if you're high enough and not facing highway, quiet.  Breakfast is quite decent although not a lot of fresh fruit. Juices are out of a machine but quite good. Coffee is mediocre. Fresh omelette is great - just wish the cook smiled once. Breakfast potatoes can be avoided - wish they would change that up a little everyday like substitute with hash browns.  One complaint that a water bottle is not complimentary daily for HHonors members - only on check in. I mean, it costs 25-30c a bottle!! Check what other hotels do for their loyalty program members.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Staff and facilities were excellent and would definitely stay again. Breakfast was as good as you would get at any major breakfast restaurant. very clean and well kept facility and like the idea of it all being incorporated into a courtyard type setting.
Manager Response: Dear Ralph,  Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you had such a great experience while staying at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim-North. Thank you for your delightful feedback! We look forward to seeing you again in the not too distant future.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: All We Needed & A Little More
Summary: Bed was very comfortable; more room than 2 people needed but appreciated extra sitting area / TV.  Property is a little older and could use some upgrades, but the location was close to family and Disneyland (although very few restaurants close by).  Surprised that room service (simple burger / fries) was above average in quality.  Served hot and prompt, cooked perfectly to order.
Manager Response: Dear Russell,  Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you were comfortable in one of our newly renovated guest suites. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: This hotel has a beautiful atrium in the center that makes you feel like you are in a faraway destination, even though we were only 20 minutes from home. My husband and I were married here 19 years ago, so we thought it would be a perfect place to celebrate our daughter's 15th birthday hotel slumber party.  We booked 2 rooms next to each other (one for my hubby and I, the other for our daughter and her friends), and had requested that they be at the very end of the hallway so as to not bother any other guests. (Teen girls can get quite giggly late at night!)   The staff was very accommodating (even providing some simple items needed for our hotel scavenger hunt), the indoor pool was a plus for the end of January weather, the manager's reception snacks and drinks were great for
Manager Response: Dear Rose Mary,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us for your daughter's 15th birthday! Our Team takes pride in delivering special and thoughtful service and we am so happy to hear that you were able to see and enjoy this first hand. Thank you for your valued feedback!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: Great Stay! Close to Disneyland! Great Room! Great Pool!
Summary: Stayed here for 1 night for a quick Disneyland trip. Property was great! Staff was nice, room was great. The kids loved that it was cold outside yet they could swim in the indoor pool which was about 85 degrees! Hot breakfast the next day was great and included cooked-to-order omelettes. Well worth the money. Took us 15 minutes to get to Disneyland parking structure from the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Vanessa,  Thank you for your GREAT feedback! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and our indoor pool. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: Disneyland Trip - Embassy Suites Anaheim North
Summary: Location a little out of the way but worth it.  Clean room; breakfast buffet was great; dinner in hotel was good and convenient; loved indoor pool/spa; operating hours of the pool/spa were extended to 11:00 p.m. which gave more time to use facility.
Manager Response: Thank you for your GREAT feedback! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed dinner at our hotel and our newly renovated guestrooms. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: My sisters and I took my dad to Disneyland to celebrate my sister's birthday.  The room was perfect for us.  It was quiet so my 90 year old dad to go to bed and sleep before the rest of us were ready to.  The hearty breakfast provided was fresh and filling to help us start out our day in Disneyland.  The hotel staff was friendly and the room was very clean.  The location was very close to Disneyland as well.
Manager Response: Dear Susan,  We are thrilled to hear that your family enjoyed their stay with us while visiting Disneyland. It's great to hear that you were comfortable in our newly renovated guest suite and breakfast.Thank you so much for your review and we can't wait to see you again for your next visit to Disneyland!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: It's 3AM and the freeway is still noisy
Summary: The rooms seem newly remodeled and have a welcoming lighter look than some of the other Embassy Suites I've been to recently.  Unfortunately the exterior noise isn't adequately sound prided. Just look at the hotel map and make sure your room doesn't face the freeway. The close proximity to the freeway might be good for travels, but not so good for restful slumber.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sincerely sorry that you had exterior noise challenges during your stay.We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience.   Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: The hotel has a major night club right next to it ans shares the parking lot with them. That means on the weekend lost of noise the bass is very noticeable in the room facing the club. Paring is a major problem since they block of a large part of the lot for the club. Will never stay again
Manager Response: Dear Heiko,  Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about the parking challenges and night club as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: I had a wonderful stay and the free breakfast was good but I couldn't adjust the temperature on the AC. My room was really cold at night other than that the room comfortable. The inside looks a little bit run down also. Would stay again
Manager Response: Dear Andy,  Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay and enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We are sorry that you couldn't adjust the temperature on your AC. We are always striving to improve our service offerings so we thank you for making us aware. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: Hotel is good but the parking for the club Not Good
Summary: Overall this hotels was good. The breakfast was very good. The rooms where clean. The beds were comfy. The check in and check out process was easy. The only complaint I have is that Saturday and Sunday night the club shares the same parking lot and those nights I couldn't find any parking.
Manager Response: Dear Lori,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast and our newly renovated guest suites. We are sorry to hear that that you had parking challenges on the weekend. Rest assured we will take your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement in the future.     Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: We loved our stay here. The bed was comfortable, everything was clean, the staff was very helpful and the breakfast was great.  The made to order omelets, in particular, were a definite highlight.  The evening reception was good as well.
Manager Response: Dear Benjamin,  Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you  had such a great experience while staying at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim-North. Thank you for your delightful feedback! We look forward to seeing you again in the not too distant future.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: You are unable to adjust the temperature in individual rooms as a result they room was extremely cold and there were not enough blankets and was not comfortable and couldn't sleep we had to wear coats to bed.  The refrigerator squeaked all night long.  The property seems like it's not maintained properly.
Manager Response: Dear James,  We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished. This is certainly not our goal and for this we do apologize that you had issues with your guest suite. We take your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: OK for an Embassy Suites, but weak on some details
Summary: Stayed on a Monday night. First the Pros: Good sized rooms; pretty good mgr's reception; excellent breakfast; nice building layout. The Cons: In-room coffee maker had left over water in its tank that needed to be emptied to allow it to dry out (it smelled bad); floor lamp needed a lightbulb replaced; hot water took a long time to come out of the bathroom faucet. (When it does make it to the faucet, it is fine.) I brought these items to the attention of the front desk upon check out (so t hey can fix it for the next guest). The hot water issue is not fixable any time soon. Staff is very courteous; especially at front desk and breakfast service.
Manager Response: Dear Steve,  Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Always consistent service and great experience.  A quick overnight stay during a family trip.  Breakfast bar and cooked to order breakfast was great!  Staff was so kind and helpful!  Rooms were spacious and beds were comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Tricia,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your overnight family trip. It's great to hear that you and your family enjoyed our cooked to order breakfast and our newly renovated suites. We look forward to seeing you again during your next family trip to Anaheim!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Love the accommodations and service here. The breakfast is perfect before spending the day at Disneyland and the hot tub perfect for soaking your feet afterwards. I love that this hotel has an indoor pool. The complimentary reception is such an added benefit for us all with the games, drinks, and snacks. I would love to just stay at the hotel and not go anywhere.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you had such a great experience while staying at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim-North. Thank you for your delightful feedback! We look forward to seeing you again in the not too distant future.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: Hotel keeps falling behind the 8 ball
Summary: We have stayed here numerous times and enjoy it. However, circumstances previous and most recently have placed it on our "DO NOT STAY HERE" list. First they updated the look. Not to our liking as it had an old southern type feel and now it's a clean european look which feels cold to us.      The rooms got a face lift as well, and they are cold and uninviting in our opinion. The bathroom was tiny. The shower was tiny. I am 6ft and I had only about 5-6 inches till my head touched the ceiling. I actually banged my head getting out of the shower because I didn't duck to miss the shower door frame.      Recently a rather large new night club opened up in the same parking lot as the hotel. After we got back from an event the club was in full swing. We were stopped to  be let into the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Our Team greatly appreciates your feedback and we sincerely apologize that you were disappointed with your stay. Please know that we will be sure to take your comments about our hotel under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: A very good hotel.  Interesting design, location.  Just off 91 and in north Anaheim.  The hotel has an indoor atrium that makes for a very interesting/entertaining atmosphere.  The rooms open up onto the atrium and most have mini-balconies.  I was able to score a corner room on the Northwest side which was very nice.  Only down side I could see was with some minor traffic noise, if you opened up the window.    Room was very good.  King size bed, your typical Embassy Suite layout - bedroom and living area separated by a full sized bath.  Very nice layout.  I had no issues at all and the staff was very professional.    There have a open bar for residents in the evening (5-7 pm?) were you can get free well drinks.  Nice touch.  One other downside is that there aren't any
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that were comfortable in our newly renovated suites and enjoyed our cooked-to-order breakfast. Thank you for your valued feedback and we can't wait to see you again during your next visit to Southern California!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: Hotel in desperate need of update
Summary: While the service I received from the staff in particular Jorge who checked me in was stellar  I must agree with other reviewers that the hotel is in desperate need of an update.   The amenities and furnishings the room are very old and tired. It wasn't shabby or anything but just was reminiscient of a room circa early 2000s. The breakfast was average and adequate for an embassy suites.  What I found to be intolerable however was the climate in the room. It was stifling and this though the temperature outside was around 50. The room was very hot and smelled of moisture. The hvac system in the hotel doesn't allow for individual control of the climate. It made for a somewhat uncomfortable stay.  All in all a decent hotel but I would stay elsewhere next time
Manager Response: Dear Dan,  Thank you for your feedback, and we are thrilled to hear that our staff provided you stellar service. We are surprised to hear that you mentioned our hotel is in desperate need of an update considering that our hotel has been recently renovated. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience.   Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: The hotel itself is conveniently located near Disney and Knotts.  About a 15 minute drive on the highway.  There is shopping and restaurants relatively close and the room is a typical Embassy Suites.  However, some things you need to keep in mind if you plan on staying here.  Breakfast starts at 7am on the weekends.  This makes it hard to eat and get to Dinsey when it opens, in case that is your plan.  Also, there is a night club located in the front parking lot open from 9pm to 2am Thursday to Sunday that can be heard from the room.  At 9pm, the club blocks off all open parking spots in the front for valet parking. If you aririve after 9pm, you have to park along the sides or the back.  The evening features half dressed club goers walking through and hanging out in the Atrium.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests. We will sincerely consider all of your feedback. Thank you for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: Great place to Stay with Family
Summary: Nice friendly staff, great service specially the breakfast add a great value during your family stay.....house keeping is fantastic and location is great nice a calm close to Diseney Land.. I will recommend and deffinately will go back again
Manager Response: Dear Ansar,  Thank you for your terrific review. We are glad to hear that our staff had provided you and your family friendly service during your stay. Our team takes great pride by making sure that our guests have a great stay. We can't wait to see you and your family during your next visit to Disneyland.  Sincerely, Caterina

Summary: We stayed there for one night. We had a late check in so we missed the happy hour but we were mostly looking forward to their breakfast! Unfortunately, the buffet area wasn't appetizing.  I tried the potatoes and they weren't hot nor warm, I could tell they had been sitting in the pan  for quite some time. The cook was friendly.The omelette was okay. Overall, nothing impressive.  Kudos to Ramona! We arrived around 1230am yet she had a smile and made us feel welcomed!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear that Ramona and our team made you feel welcome. We apologize however that our breakfast wasn't appetizing. We are always striving to improve our service offerings so we thank you for making us aware. We do hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Each room is a 2 room suite with mini refrigerator and microwave. Each room was very clean and had nice amenities such as complimentary wi-fi for HHonor members, coffee and tea supplies, and a tv in each room. Only Embassy hotel in area that does not charge parking fees. There is a shuttle available for an additional fee that takes guests to Disneyland. It takes about 20-30 minutes but does not make any stops at other hotels which is a plus. The complimentary breakfast and happy hour is well worth it! It is one of the main reasons we always stay at an Embassy hotel. My only compliant is the hotel runs on a heating/cooling system that changes based on the weather. It took awhile to warm the room but hotel had complimentary space heaters to use for the room which really helped.
Manager Response: Dear Natalie,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us! It sounds like you had enjoyed our newly renovated guest suites, breakfast, and our Evening Reception. Thank your for feedback about the heating/cooling system. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. We hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful. There where maintenance issues we brought up. The shuttle to Disneyland was nice and on time. The shuttle ride was a little long especially at the end of the day (25 minutes). The shuttle picked us up at the main entrance of the hotel so security was not an issue. The buffet was nice and the interior of the hotel was nice with the water and foliage. We will most likely return.
Manager Response: Dear George,  Thank you for your review, we are happy to hear that our staff was friendly and was able to help you with your room's maintenance issues. We are also glad that you enjoyed our buffet and the interior of the hotel. Looking forward to seeing you again next time.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: We live only 2 miles from the hotel and we go there for a weekend away. We made new friends that also  come there, when they go to Disneyland. If there is water in the river stay on the south side and as high up as you can get.  North side is good if there is snow on the mountains and clear. The happy hour is very good Ralph (bar tender) is very help full. The breakfast is good go early for the best selections.  Get your coffee and roll to put on a table to hold it.
Manager Response: Dear Bill,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent weekend stay with us! We will make sure to recognize and reward Ralph for being helpful. Thank you again for your delightful feedback and we cannot wait to see you during your next weekend stay.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Overall good stay, front desk is very friendly, rooms are nice and big. Free breakfast and cocktail hour are a plus. Rates on Disney shuttle are good! Indoor pool is great for the kids.  Food in the restaurant was not very good quality and very expensive.
Manager Response: Dear Theresa,  Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated guest rooms and complimentary breakfast. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. We look forward to accommodating you and your family during your next visit to Disneyland.  Sincerely, Caterina

Summary Heading: the hotel is nice the servers are terrible
Summary: give you fish crackers, hot salsa, cheap type of snacks for that reception they brag about.  Then chefs don't care and give out the wrong omelet. You get to choose all the things you want then they don't keep track and give you someone else's  instead of being smart and numbering them. The restaurant is all dark so can't eat there and a joke. It is 14 dollars for a hamburger????? and up from there just exorbitant prices that don't make sense. Spaghetti 20  Fun
Manager Response: Dear Linda,  We greatly appreciate your feedback. We will be sure to take your comments about our  hotel's amenities seriously as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Great hotel with incredible atmosphere- inside courtyard with waterfall was such a great setting for breakfast or just hanging out chatting with friends and family. The "Made to Order breakfast was the best complimentary breakfast that I have ever had! Grill chefs, not too friendly but otherwise, great clean hotel! Excellent value for the price.
Manager Response: Dear Melanie,  Our Team could not be happier to hear that you had enjoyed your recent stay with us! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our hotel's atrium and made to order breakfast. Thank you for your delightful feedback. Looking forward to seeing you again next time.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: This was our second time staying at the Embassy Anaheim North. We used this hotel about a year and a half ago when we visited Disney, and had a great time--hotel was clean, staff was friendly and helpful, and everything was great. This time, when we arrived, our room wasn't clean--the bathroom was dirty and there was food in the microwave from the previous guests. In fact, the microwave was still beeping, which is how we found out it was there. When we reported the problem to the front desk, the person who helped us was brusque and tried to move us to a room that was already occupied. When we informed him that someone was already there, he was rude to us and wouldn't believe us until he went and checked it out for himself. The second day of our stay, housekeeping neglected to
Manager Response: Dear Staci,  We are sorry to hear that your second stay with us did not meet your expectations, and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished. This is certainly not our goal as we take great pride in providing great service and a clean hotel  for our guests. I assure you that we will take all of your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement in the future. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so we can show you what our hotel and team are truly made of. Thank you for your feedback!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: We usually stay at Embassy Suites when traveling with the kids.  The breakfast and evening reception are a perk!  We drove to Disneyland which took roughly 15 minutes.  The rooms were nice and the hotel itself was clean.
Manager Response: Dear Beverlee,  We are just thrilled to hear that your family enjoyed your stay with us during your visit to Disneyland. Thank you for your valued feedback, we look forward to accommodating you and your family during your next visit!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: Great hotel and location for Disney
Summary: We have stayed here several times and enjoy it.  Very good rooms, staff, location, breakfast, pool, etc.  it takes about 15 minutes to get to the park from here and there is easy parking for your car here too.   They have a nice menu for kids at dinner and there is also a great Italian restaurant about a block away.  We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you and your family had such a great experience while staying at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim-North.  We are also happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated guest suites, breakfast, and hotel amenities. Thank you again for your great review. We look forward to seeing you and your family during your next visit to Disneyland!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: Under Expectations and is not cheap
Summary: Previously booked we received an incorrect room, they did not credited points on my HHonors account because I booked through my company website, the lady at the reception with rude manners. Room and furniture old, requires renovation. Morning complementary breakfast was poor. To arrive to the parking lot you drive in front of two Gentleman's Night Clubs You could find a better deal in the area for what you pay here

Summary Heading: will stay again but not based on this experience
Summary: overall a good stay. i love the amenities at any embassy suites and this is a convenient location. my check-in experience was awful with total lack-luster, unfriendly, could-care-less service. the service after check-in was ok. we had some issues in our room with the tub faucet and thermostat, but i didn't report it because i prefer to not have maintenance staff in my room during my stay. i did report the faucet when i left but forgot to mention the thermostat. i was also given a wi-fi code that only worked 1 day, not the full 5 that i was there.
Manager Response: Dear Roxana,  We are terribly sorry to hear that there were so many challenges with your recent stay and that we did not meet your expectations. We always strive to provide excellent service to our guests. I assure you that we will take all of your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement in the future. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope that you will give us the opportunity to make things right.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Problems that they know will affect your stay such as the HVAC would be a good thing to know. When I told them my room was hot they said "oh yea" we only have to loops one for heat and one for cooling, when it gets to a certain temp you only have heat, you can open a window and we will give you a fan. The beauty of the fan, it was noisy when turned to a speed you could feel it and was about the size you put on your desk!
Manager Response: Dear David,  We are terribly sorry to hear that our hotel did not meet your standards and that you had problems with the HVAC unit. We will be sure to take your comments  seriously as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: We had a one night free "points" stay Christmas eve with my wife & daughter before a family gathering.  The hotel is the typical atrium-styled Embassy Suites. The rooms have a nice sofa-bed, and have a small refrigerator and microwave. Standard Embassy Suite size rooms.  The carpet wasn't well vacuumed, with some food scrapes left from the last guests. The sliding door to the balcony was nearly impossible to open ... needs repair. The pillows were very small ... but lots of them. Thank goodness the HVAC system is quiet.  The morning complimentary buffet was poor. Non-crispy "paper thin" bacon (when not out), waffles always out, and ONLY honeydew melon as the fresh cut fruit. Had to wait for clean plates. Maybe they had their "C" team working Christmas morning.  The whole buffet
Manager Response: We are terribly sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished. This is certainly not our goal and for this we do apologize. Rest assured that we have looked into each and every item that you mentioned and have made adjustments where applicable. We take your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: This stay started bad and never got better. When I arrived I waited to register while a couple 'chit-chatted' with the young lady doing the check-in about Disneyland characters and how they come and go in and out of the park and some other very insignificant matters regarding the characters. Finally, the male half of the couple said, let's get going so this man can check-in. Really? The customer has to be the one to recognize that 'chit-chatting' while people are waiting to register is not a good idea. (She was the only person on duty or I would have gone to a different clerk for check-in) The ac/heat vent in the room rattled loudly all night long. It was so bad that from the second night on we just turned it off altogether and decided to be cold instead of listen to the rattle
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that you had issues with the ac/heating unit, as well as your room not being cleaned. This is certainly not our goal and for this we do apologize. Rest assured that we take feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement in the future. Thank you for your feedback!

Summary Heading: Found employees to be especially cordial & helpful.
Summary: The room was very nice & breakfast was great. After a long day at Disneyland my friend & I went  into the lounge for an appetizer & drink. The woman who was working that evening was outstanding. Great service with a big smile. The people who worked the breakfast were also very friendly. The woman who checked us in let us into our room earlier than regular check in time. The hotel has been remodeled since the last time I was there. It is very comfortable. I look forward to staying there again.
Manager Response: Dear Pamela,  Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you had such a great experience while staying with us. Thank you for your delightful feedback and we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: This is a great hotel. It was a bit cheaper than hotels closer to Disneyland and the difference is worth it. The shuttle isnt a bad ride to the hotel (only 15-30 minutes). Comfortable beds. Quiet. Very friendly staff. Large suites. Good continental full breakfast with an omelett bar. My only complaint is the heating and air conditioning. The controls are for the entire hotel...not individual. We were very hot at night and no air as the heater turns on if outside temp is lower than 70. We just turn the unit off and cracked sliding door and the hotel provided a small fan. I would definitely stay here again but bring a bigger fan...lol.
Manager Response: Dear Debbie,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated suites and breakfast. We do apologize about the air conditioning and heating unit, and we will use this as a training opportunity for improvement in the future. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: This hotel was FREEZING.  The heat/AC system is a joke, and you have no real control over it.  I had a jacket on for the breakfast buffet.  Rooms were old, bed was lumpy.  No drain in tub.  Hot tub was cold (they did turn it up for us)  I selected the room I wanted online and then was told it was not available upon arrival.  The room they did give us was smelly, so had to get another room.  One problem after another.  The staff DID try to be helpful, so it was not service as much as quality of hotel.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback, and thank you for your comments in regards to the staff being helpful. Please accept my apologies in regards to our two pipe system for the air conditioning/heat, as it either works as heat or air conditioning depending on the outside temperature.  I am also sorry that we could not honor your room selection at check in, and that you had to change rooms. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: We stayed here for two nights on a weekend trip to Disneyland. The hotel has a beautiful area for breakfast which was really delicious. Made to order breakfast can't go wrong there. The rooms were very spacious and comfortable. Having a balcony was a plus because we were able to see the fireworks from Disneyland which the kids and myself loved. Now for the negative side. There's a club that shares the same parking lot with the hotel. So you have random people around the hotel going in not having a room but for whatever reason maybe the bar inside has better prices i don't know. Parking in the same parking lot as you do so you must get to the hotel early so you can get a parking spot. The first night,which was a Saturday,there were cars doing doughnuts in the parking lot blasting
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the service inconsistencies during your stay. We will be sure to take your comments seriously as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: This is my third stay at this hotel.  Anytime go to Disneylad, this is the only place I stay.  It is awesome! The breakfast and amenities are fabulous. I have recommended other people for this hotel.  I am returning to Disneyland in May 2016 and I will be reserving up to 7 rooms for family. It's close to Walmart and other stores.  Excellent choice.
Manager Response: Dear Dianna,  We are so happy to hear that you had the best stay ever at our hotel. Thank you for recommending our hotel to your friends and family, we truly appreciate it. We look forward to your upcoming stay during May 2016!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Very good experience I stay before on one of this hotel in San Francisco and I really like it.I love the complementary  breakfast, its very clean,  all remodeled and the service was excellent.  Thank you for wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel,  We are happy to hear that you had a very good experience at Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim-North while traveling on business. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and newly remodeled guest suites. Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business! Looking forward to seeing you again on your next visit to Anaheim!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: I have frequently visited Embassy Suites Anaheim North, and the overall experience is really good.  The remodeling took care of the aging issues of the past, and the improvements are in all the right areas.  The beds are very comfortable.  The TV's are a little disappointing, but for a hotel, they work.  The staff is truly outstanding, as they really give personal attention to their guests.  I have reviewed this hotel before, and yet the 5-star rating is deserved.  While there might be a few things that might not be 100%, they overall make the experience really pleasant.  I have stayed on floors 3, 4, 5, and 7 both near and away from the recycling plant and the freeway.  The external noise is faint for the most part.  Housekeeping did make a mistake (coffeemaker wasn't cleaned
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: The suites are very big and accomodating.  The sofa bed is big and 2 persons can sleep comfortable there.  The beds are by far the best feature of this hotel. We only missed coffee/tea offered in the lobby.  But the breakfast was good and the cooks were fast compared to other locations embassy suites I've been to.
Manager Response: Dear Ulises,  We are happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed our newly renovated suites. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" which allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: A very good hotel, good attention to the guests and good service at the noon!! You will find a very big rooms, with living room separate of the bedroom, very clean and comfortable, for business or personal purpose you will have a very good stay!!
Manager Response: Dear Joan,  We are so thrilled to hear that you had a really good experience during your recent stay. Thank you so much for your feedback. Looking forward to seeing you again for your next visit to the area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: Upon my visit, my colleague and I ate at the restaurant downstairs, where we sat ourselves and waited over 20 minutes to be given a menu. The waitress seemed unable to keep up with the only four tables that were occupied at the time while what appeared to be the manager sat in the corner watching her struggle. I ordered the fried chicken entrée which was served with cold mashed potatoes and what tasted like rotten corn on the cob. The waitress also never brought the side salad I ordered with my meal. That being said I did enjoy the sliders as my appetizer. The worst part of my visit though was the unexpected and uninvited visitor that showed up in our room (came in through the locked door without knocking) around 330 am while we were sleeping. Whoever this "mystery visitor" was
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear about the challenges you experienced in the restaurant.  This is certainly not the feeling we wish our guests to have while patronizing out restaurant.  As a result of your feedback we have already used this as a Training Opportunity with the Kitchen and Restaurant Staff.  We assure you that the Hotel takes the Safety and Security of all of our guests VERY seriously.  Immediately when you mentioned your concerns to our staff we investigated to see if there was anything that the Hotel needed to address.  What we found is that no employee entered your guestroom during the hours you speak of (or at any time around these hours).   Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary Heading: Poorest excuse for an Embassy Suites we've ever stayed at
Summary: As Hilton honors members, we have stayed at and enjoyed many Embassy Suites hotels in several different areas.  This was by far the worst.  The TV in our living room did not work.  Maintenance said the TV was shot and needed to be replaced, and that he would get a new one.  A few minutes later, he called to say there were no new ones, and that the hotel was completely booked!  The "manager's reception" was the worst I've ever seen!  We are used to having any well drink, beer and wine for free.  This hotel was limited to beer, wine and whatever the "drink special of the week" was; if you wanted anything else, they charged you!  Snacks consisted of a bowl of popcorn and a bowl of tortilla chips with salsa.  Again, used to much better appetizers at other Embassy Suites locations.
Manager Response: Dear Tim,  We are truly sorry to hear that your recent stay at our hotel was not up to your expectations and that you were misinformed with what we offer during our Evening Reception. Our Evening Reception’s offerings are exactly as you will find at every Embassy Hotel which includes; complimentary drinks (including well drinks) and a variety of snacks.  We are also sorry to hear that you felt that our staff had treated you rudely, which is certainly not our goal and for this we apologize. We assure you that we take your feedback very seriously and will make sure to use it as a training opportunity with our Hotel Team to enhance our guests experience in the future. Thank you again for your valued feedback.  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary: This Embassy Suites met all our needs.  Room was roomy and comfortable.  Breakfast was great.  Location was easy to find for out of towners.  Easy access to the freeway.  The place was pretty full with a lot of Disneyland traffic but we didn't notice any noise.  The front desk staff was very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Anne,  We are so happy to hear that we were able to meet all of your needs during your recent stay! We are glad that you enjoyed our cooked-to-order breakfast and our newly renovated guest suites. Thank you for your delightful feedback! We look forward to seeing you again in the not too distant future.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: We were on the fourth floor and as soon as we entered, we saw the blackened ceiling, with a cobweb dangling over the sofa. The vent was uneven, it was hot in the bedroom and freezing in the dining area. The drain did not work properly until maintenance came to fix it and he took the stopper off. The bathtub was black and grimy. The water from the shower doesn't stop and would drip for hours. The only reason it got 3 stars from us is due the very nice people working there. This is isolated from other businesses, except for one night club on the other side of ES's lot. There are no place you could walk to, like shops or restaurants. Even by car, we had to go on the freeway and we all know what LA's freeways are like.
Manager Response: Dear Connie,  Thank you for your review. We are terribly sorry to hear that you encountered many challenges with your recent stay and that our hotel did not meet your expectations.  We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel but ended up being charged 3 times.
Summary: Wonderful experience during stay and would have earned 5 stars...but after paying in advance on Orbitz, I was charged again by the hotel after my stay. I called to get the charge reversed and ended up getting charged again! Took way too much time and effort to get resolved. Sad because the hotel was really nice, staff was helpful, and happy hour and breakfast included were great!
Manager Response: Dear Jena,  Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated hotel's services and amenities. We apologize however that you had some billing issues during your stay. This was certainly not our intension and we apologize for any inconveniences that you may have experienced. We take your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement. We do hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.   Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary Heading: Great stay at a reasonable price!
Summary: A couple of friends and I stayed at the Embassy Suites while touring LA.  We all loved this place! Our room was plenty large enough for 3 people and very clean.  We had a big enough pool to swim in and a Jacuzzi.  The hotel desk clerk was extremely helpful in giving us directions to the various attractions that we had planned to visit, and, ladies talk about what staying at this place does for one's hair!  My friend and I couldn't figure out whether it was the shampoo and conditioner provided by Embassy Suites or whether it was their water system, but we both agreed that our hair had never before and never since been as soft!  I'd love to know what their secret is.  Our stay here was fantastic in every respect!  (We stayed here in 2002.)
Manager Response: We are so excited that you and your friends enjoyed your stay with us while touring LA, and that our hotel staff was very helpful in recommending area attractions. We are also glad to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated two room suites and our indoor pool. Thank you for your feedback and we cannot wait to accommodate you and your friends on your next tour to LA.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: I loved the look of the hotel.  The shower water was never hot.  It was warm, which made us rush our showers.  That and the smell in the front room were the only thing that I didn't like.  Other than that, the overall appearance and cleanliness of the hotel was great.  The complimentary breakfast was good.  There were several options.  I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Azzure,  Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We appreciate that you would recommend our hotel. We apologize however that you had some issues with your guest suite and we are surprised to hear this since they have been newly renovated. We are always striving to improve our service offerings so we thank you for making us aware. Thank you again and we can't wait for your next visit to Anaheim!  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Nice room, though ours was slightly musty smelling. The hotel was well maintained, but our shower temperature never seemed to remain consistent and I'm not a fan of random blasts of cold water. The staff was super friendly and helpful, which is a bonus in my book. Breakfast was good, certainly better than most "free" breakfasts. All in all a very pleasant stay and we will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear that you feel  our staff was friendly and helpful. We apologize however that you had some service inconsistencies during your stay. We are always striving to improve our service offerings so we thank you for making us aware. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary Heading: Bar nice drinks great breakfasts was tasteless
Summary: We spent 5 nights while my husband was in a conference. The bar manager was great, drinks better. Rooms were nice. Breakfast was bland. Asked everyday for a small omelet well done. Never got either. Eggs tasted like the oil they were cooked in. No real variety and we have stayed in several Embassy Suites this is by far the lowest quality we have stayed out. Bus service to Disney is not very good. Only once an hour and then stops for 4 hours when you would like to go to room to get out of the heat.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: We have stayed at Embassy Suites in many locations.  Love the rooms and the breakfasts.  Always clean.  This one stood out because of the extra touches.  For a very small fee, we were able to take a shuttle to Disneyland.  It was timely and comfortable.  The front desk employees were efficient and personable.  As this was a vacation with our grandchildren, we loved the table off to one side in the lobby with paper and crayons.  Not only was that a draw for the kids but it kept them occupied so that the check-in, check-out process was easy and hassle free.  Thanks you.
Manager Response: Dear Judy,  We are just thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our front office team was efficient and personable with you and your family. Our Team takes great pride in the Hotel and truly enjoys connecting with our guests. We are also happy that your grand children enjoyed our coloring station. Thank you for your feedback and we can't wait to see you soon!  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Stayed here and the staff was friendly and courteous. The gardens were well kept and loved the indoor/outdoor feeling. Room was great. The breakfast was good, food was fresh and there were omelets made to order. Close to Knotts Berry Farm which was a plus. Will stay here again, soon!
Manager Response: Dear Lynn,  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear our staff  provided you friendly and courteous service! We are also happy to hear that enjoyed our cooked-to-order omelets and loved the hotel's atmosphere. We truly appreciate that you will be coming back soon and we can't wait for your return.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Room was clean.  Small kitchen perfect for short stay.  Desk space and plugs for chargers perfect for getting work done while away from the office.  Separate living space and bedroom areas.  Resort type of feel, dinning, breakfast, lunch, dinner, happy hour, gym, pool, spa, and meeting rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Naomi,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim-North while traveling on business. It sounds like you enjoyed our newly renovated guest suite. Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business! Looking forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Anaheim!  Sincerely, Caterina Y.

Summary Heading: Convenience, good value, with a touch of Disney!
Summary: Most importantly you can sleep well here without too much ambient noise! Booked the room on Priceline and later requested a room on the south side of the building away from freeway noise. Luckily they honored my request! From the room I looked out over the sculpted Santa Ana river and listened to Canada geese and left the sliding glass door open for fresh air. After midnight I heard people in the back parking lot possibly returning to the cars after a night of dancing at XALOS night club located next door.  Check-in was easy at 11pm! Breakfast choices included coffee, made-to-order omelettes, french toast, oatmeal, cereals, eggs, bacon, sausage, potatoes, fresh fruit, bread, and yogurt. I missed not having honey and a milk alternative like soy or almond milk. There were plenty
Manager Response: Dear Geo,  Thank you for your lovely feedback. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the ambiance in one of our newly renovated suites, and that our staff was accommodating to your requests. We hope to see you again soon. Take care!  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Overall we had a decent two-night stay.  This hotel is obviously older, but they did a nice job of modernizing the rooms and common areas. The breakfast was about on par for Embassy Suites standards. The evening reception was a little better than average, offering hummus and pita strips in addition to popcorn and tortilla chips and salsa. A definite negative is the proximity of the hotel to the on-ramp and the freeway itself.  I'm not a light sleeper but was woken up each day at about 5:30 am by the traffic noise. Light sleepers will definitely want to request a room on the other side of the building unless they've brought their ear plugs! When I checked I got disappointing news. When I made the online reservation the website read "Complimentary parking and non-stop shuttle
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us feedback for your recent stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary Heading: Good Value for Space and Service
Summary: This hotel has comfortable, quiet rooms. Good value since it includes breakfast. Choices of breakfast foods are limited, but good for price paid.  Location is only about 15 minutes from Disneyland so that is a plus.
Manager Response: Dear Raymond,  Thank you for your GREAT feedback! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and that hotel provided good value for the space and service.We look forward to seeing you soon during your next visit to Disneyland.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary Heading: The place to stay with a family when visiting Disneyland
Summary: Quiet, comfortable, luxury. Save time and money with included breakfast, no charge for parking, and close enough to the park to quickly and easily learn the surface streets to get there.  Indoor heated pool and fitness center plus a beautiful facility indoors with glass elevators.
Manager Response: Dear Victor,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim-North while visiting Disneyland. Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business! Looking forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Disneyland.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Stayed at the Anaheim Embassy North hotel. Great staff, and easy online check in. Breakfast buffet is excellent if youre taking the kids to Disneyland. Great Shuttle service to the park as well. Only problem was I had a stained comforter which has never happened before.
Manager Response: Dear Jason,  Thank you for your review, we greatly appreciate your feedback. Our hotel is happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us while visiting Disneyland. We apologize however that you had a stained comforter. We are always striving to improve our service offerings so we thank you for making us aware. We do hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your family is planning their next trip to Disneyland!  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Very nice hotel to stay in.  Great breakfast, very close to out event.  A complimentary car wash area as well as parking for cars was provided with security.  Hopefully the atrium can be kept (and coy fish/turtles) returned.  Overall a very good stay.
Manager Response: Dear Don,  Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you such a great experience while staying at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim-North for Sharktober Fest. Thank you for your delightful feedback! We look forward to seeing you again during the next Sharktober Fest!  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: This hotel is, like all Embassy hotels, good but not great. The upsides to it are its only 6 miles from Disneyland, great breakfast, comfy beds (yes even the pullout) and gorgeous lobby. The downsides are the hotel shuttle does not go to Disneyland you have to pay for an ART pass to get there, the parking lot shares space with a ghetto night club, and it is next to a highway. The highway isn't so bad it is generally not too loud. The pool and hot tub are really clean which is always great. It is also only half an hour from Newport Beach which is the cleanest beach I have ever seen in my life!!! This is a Good Neighbor hotel for Disney so I chose it. All in all it was a good trip except for the HELL that is Disney on a Saturday and coming back and seeing that the night club next
Manager Response: Dear Chris,  Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the hotel with exception to the transportation to Disneyland and nightclub. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Nice hotel, just request a room that the balcony does not face east, other than that, I would recommend this hotel to business travelers and families wanting to be near the theme parks. Staff is very personable and efficient, room service is speedy and the quality of food options are great.
Manager Response: Dear Scot,  Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear that you would recommend our hotel to business travelers and families.We look forward to your stay with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area. All the best!   Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Little weird next to night club coming back to hotel late, but hotel did have security out front at night.  Great view of junk yard out our window. Room size was nice with separate 'living room' area room was pretty clean with cozy bed, bathroom was a bit small and dated. We stayed here for a Disney vacation. It was too far away from Disney, too much traffic to get stuck in each day.  Hot breakfast included each day was nice. Frond desk staff was not that friendly.
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear that your experience at our hotel during your Disney vacation did not meet your expectations.This is certainly not our goal and for this we do apologize. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again so we can show you a positive experience similar to what so many other guests are sharing while staying with us.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Service is great and friendly atmosphere.  Rooms are very clean and have the comfort of home. What more can you ask for when you must be away from family?  Oh! And the happy hours and breakfast are awesome!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. It sounds like our friendly staff and newly renovated guest suites make our hotel your "Home Away From Home". Thank you for your delightful feedback, we look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary Heading: My October 2015 stay at Embassy Suites
Summary: I came here for a Mystery Shopping Conference.  It was very nice to stay here and we had an excellent room.  The only problem was the lack of juices on Saturday morning and a lot of kids running around without supervision riding up and down on the elevator.  But otherwise it was very good and I would recommend it to anyone I know.
Manager Response: Dear Joan,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay for the recent Mystery Shopping Conference at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim-North. We hope it was a successful trip for you and your company. Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business! We look forward to seeing you again for your next conference.   Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Great experience. Very helpful staff. Great complementary hot breakfast. Loved the good coffee and made to order omelets. Enjoyed the two hour complementary drinks in the afternoon. Would love if they have the option of two beds without extra charge.
Manager Response: Dear Yadira,  Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you had such a great experience while staying with us. Thank you for your delightful feedback and for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Everyone went out of their way to make our stay a pleasant one!  Christopher, at the front desk, was the best!  The breakfast was consistently good.  The beds were some of the most comfortable I have ever slept in away from home!  Only wish that it had been closer to the Disney properties.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that our staff went out of their way to make your stay a pleasant one at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim-North. We take pride in providing excellent service to our guests, and will make sure to reward Christopher. Also, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated suites and breakfast.Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to Anaheim!  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Great service (no delay at check in), amazing complimentary breakfast (more than just muffins and coffee, it was a full hot breakfast) and the most comfortable bed I've ever slept it! Close to Disneyland too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We're glad to hear you received excellent service during your recent stay! We are also happy to hear that our newly renovated suite provided the most comfortable bed you had slept in. We hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary Heading: A bit worn but a comfortable and convenient place to stay.
Summary: We stayed for three nights to visit Disneyland.  The shuttle was inexpensive, $12 for a three day unlimited ride pass.  The pool was great for the kids and the gym was decent.  The free large breakfast was great, as usual, and meant never looking for food before noon.  The staff was very friendly and efficient and the housekeeping did a very good and thorough job of keeping the rooms clean and neat.  For those that like to relax in the evening, the open bar, (happy hour +), in the evening helps alot.  The beds are super comfortable and it is hard to get up in the morning because you are so snug.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay while visiting Disneyland. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your valued business!  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Family vacation to Disney with the wife and three kids.  We stayed at the Embassy Suites-Anaheim North and were extremely pleased.  Two queen beds in the bedroom with a full pull-out couch in the living room = plenty of room to still move about.  The bathroom was a little small, but there is a convenient sink/faucet in the transition section between the rooms to alleviate the issue.  Two TV's made downtime more simple and the extra room with desk allowed for an easy eat in dinner when we were to exhausted to go anywhere to dine!  The included breakfast with actual cooked to order omelette was a perfect start to extremely busy days.  Housekeeping arrived a little late in the day (after 4:30pm on Sat!) but other than that the staff was great and attentive.  The free reception was
Manager Response: Dear Bill,  Thank you for your GREAT feedback! We are happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed our spacious,newly renovated guestrooms. We look forward to seeing you again soon during your next Disneyland trip.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: My wife and I and our 4 kids stayed at Embassy Suites - North for our trip to Disneyland. We were very happy with the Hotel. The staff was friendly and helpful. The hot breakfast was awesome considering that it was free. Pancaked, french toast sticks or waffles, bacon, sausage, omelettes made to order, fruit, yogurt, etc. The food itself was good but not great, but certainly much better than many typical free hotel continental breakfast options. Room was Housekeeping staff was great. The room was showing a little wear hear and there, but was clean. Our room was on the freeway side of the hotel, and there was definitely traffic noise. For us it wasn't a problem as we're not light sleepers, but if you are then request a room away from the freeway. The location is pretty far from
Manager Response: Our hotel team is happy to hear that we delivered great service to you and your family, during your Disneyland trip. We are also happy to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and two-room suites.Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely, Caterina

Summary: Sorry, but this hotel has some staffing issues; most probably they're understaffed.  1. Right from when checked in, was told to park at the back as the room i was in was nearer to the elevators near the back entrance. Carts were not there. Had to move them all the way from entrance. So, not a good first impression there 2. Had to call front desk, at least twice, for towels/ blankets. Took them at least 1/2 hour, 3 separate calls. This, is not only on just one occasion.  3. Fitness room needs upgrading. One treadmill broken, another one had a non working treadmill TV.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished. This is certainly not our goal and for this we do apologize. Rest assured that we take feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement in the future. Thank you for your feedback!  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: We were visiting los Angeles and needed to see the tourist areas and also visit a few cars at riverside  Embassy suites had perfect accomodation for 3 guys with 2 queen beds and a fold out couch. The suite was quite large in size and very clean. Breakfast and wifi were included Location was great as it is located next to the highway very easy easy in and out of la
Manager Response: Dear Mick McMillan,  Thank you again for selecting our hotel for your USA cars trip! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and our newly renovated guestrooms. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary Heading: Very nice property, older but fully updated rooms.
Summary: This is a very typical Embassy Suites.  The best things of this brand are the cocktail reception overnight and free cooked to order breakfast for everyone.  The rooms are very nicely appointed. they have an adequate workout facility although during my stay one of the treadmills was broken and not working.  The temp int he workout facility was nice.  They have a very nice swimming pool and hot tub. Although due to the large amounts of families going to Disney it may not be relaxing for travelers without children.  The breakfast is fantastic and the coffee is very tasty.  The two rooms suites are great for spreading out and feeling like a home away from home.  My only real complaint is that during the happy hour the snacks are without any healthy choices.  No veggies.  Just chips
