Manager Response: Dear Ross,  We greatly appreciate your feedback. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Not up to Embassy Standards with respect to cleanliness and overall service.  Location next to a night club which on Friday and Saturday night made it hard to get access to parking lot.  Security staff required due to the high volume of people in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We sincerely apologize for the cleanliness and service issues that you experienced; our hotel works hard to ensure the comfort and satisfaction of our guests and we are very sorry that did not meet your expectations. We also apologize that the Club adjacent to the Hotel was a parking challenge for you during your stay. We hope that this will not stop you from staying with us again in the future.  Sincerely,  Caterina Y

Summary: Hotel was nice, pretty much same as all Embassy Suites Hotels, but the downsides were that they do not tell you ahead of time that the shuttle from hotel to Disneyland is an ART shuttle, not hotels and they do not run between 11am - 4pm every day. They also do not tell you that the shuttle costs $5 per person per day! This particular hotel is also about a 25 minute shuttle ride to and from Disneyland, a bit too far if you are tired and want to return quickly. Also, the ART drivers all give different information about pick up times so you can end up waiting 40 minutes for a shuttle instead of 10.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that your perception of our hotel's shuttle services has been tarnished. This is certainly not our goal and for this we do apologize. Rest assured that we have looked into each and every item that you mentioned and have made adjustments where applicable. We take your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: Such a nice place. Very elegant and clean. The view was excellent and the food was great. Nice and calm. The service was great and we are willing to go back again and make reservations on the hotel on our next family trip.
Manager Response: Dear Erika,  We are happy to hear you and your family had such a great experience while staying at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim-North. Thank you for your delightful feedback! We look forward to seeing you and your family again in the not too distant future.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary Heading: Outstanding Service at an Exceptional Hotel
Summary: The service provided was impeccable.  The entire staff addressed my every need and want.  The meeting facilities addressed my companies requirements to a "T".  Every employee greeted me in the morning with a smile and a good morning.  It truly goes a long way.
Manager Response: Dear Joe,  Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you had such a great experience while staying at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim-North for your meeting. We are so happy to hear that our staff addressed your company's requirements to a "T". Thank you for your wonderful feedback! We look forward to seeing you again in the not too distant future.  Sincerely, Caterina Y

Summary: I was there for a business trip and everything was perfect : The large garden in the middle of the complex was amazing The room were clear and very large and clean Great food as well in the breakfast lounge
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim North  while traveling on business.  It sounds like it was a successful trip for you and this make us so happy to hear.   Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business!  Looking forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the U.S.

Summary: Stayed at this property for a Conference and was pleasantly surprised not only with the facilities but with the friendly and professional staff as well as the food served for our group.  Everything from breakfast, lunch and dinner items where a great choice with great presentation. I will definitely be back where in the area.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the recent business conference you attended at the Embassy Suites Anaheim North and that you were able to enjoy our delicious and creative food offerings from "Bistro 3100".  Our Team takes pride in the service we provide and I am thrilled  hear that you were able to enjoy this first hand.  Thank you for your valued feedback!

Summary: Clean hotel - Efficient breakfast cook - General Manager and other managers available and visible - nice walking trail across the bridge on Santa Ana River - staff very friendly - a lot of Uber drivers in the area to make transportation easy along with a direct bus to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Want to Give it More Stars BUT.....
Summary: This hotel is in a good location for work.  The hotel is being remodeled and has many attributes.  However, the downside is it faces the 91 Freeway which you can hear if you're room faces it. The most significant downside is the poor air conditioning system.  I've stayed there three times in the last four months and each time I had issues sleeping due to the poor circulation of cool air.  In your room it has a sign indicating their heating/cooling system.  When it's hot weather the A/C doesn't go below something like 74 degrees which is ok BUT a guest cannot elect to keep the fan blow constantly.  The A/C and fan turn off and on based on the way the hotel has set the system.  Also, the main lobby and bar areas were also uncomfortably warm.  It's a bad sign when the front desk
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: My stay at the Embassy North was a great one! The room was awesome, bed was comfortable and the room was so nice and clean. The staff was such a pleasure. Everyone employee I came across acknowledged me and said hello. I would definitely refer my friends and family to this hotel.

We had our mid year meeting at the Embassy Suites and they went out of their way to make everything wonderful.  From the breakfast each morning to our breaks, lunches and dinners we couldn't have asked for anything else.  Thinking of having a meeting, have them work with you on making it special.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent business conference at the Embassy Suites Anaheim North and that you were able to enjoy our delicious food offerings from Bistro 3100.  Our Team takes pride in delivering special and thoughtful service and I am so happy to hear that you were able to see and enjoy this first hand.  Thank you for your valued feedback!

Summary: There is both good and bad here.  I picked this hotel because they are the only ones I could find in the area that have “room service”, I did not have time on my trip to be looking for restaurants or go to a grocery store.  This is the heart of Disney Land travelers so that is what the hotels seem to cater too and I guess that means no room service.     So the first problem is while their web site says they offer room service that does not include breakfast.  Most hotels that don’t have three meals note they have “limited room service”, so these guys are disingenuous for not including that information when you book.  They do offer a free group breakfast.  And when I say group I mean 80 people and their kids in vacation mode, if you like a slow start to your day this is a bit
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: Room was spacious and clean. Bed was very comfortable.  Happy hour had a nice variety of snacks.  Breakfast had a large assortment of foods to choose from.  Staff was very friendly.  Pool area was kept up well.  Bus to Disneyland worked as promised.  Plenty of free parking.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you and your family had such a great experience while staying at the Embassy Suites Anaheim North.  Thank you for your delightful feedback!  We look forward to seeing you and your family again in the not too distant future.

Summary Heading: Best Stay at a Hotel in a Long Time
Summary: The staff here are some of the best.  I had a chance to stay here on a business trip and I used the breakfast, lunch, dinner.  Excellent all around.  I also used the Meeting rooms and the staff was always there with a helping hand.  The rooms are clean, with a modern look to them.  I will definitely be staying here again and will recommend any to stay as well.

The staff was excellent! The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Whenever I needed something I got it right away! The room was perfect and the bed was SO comfortable. I would definitely return and refer friends and family to this hotel.

I was not expecting much for three day company meeting but the staff were all the friendliest, most genuine I've come across. The room was perfect since the hotel has been recently renovated and the meeting room what you would find in a modern convention center. The food was superior meal after meal including the extensive morning breakfast that was included. My family will be visiting to go to Disneyland in November and I plan to put them up at Embassy Suites Anaheim North!

Stayed here recently for a conference. My team was responsible for planning this conference on short notice and the Embassy Suites Anaheim North team helped us plan to perfection!  The rooms have been recently remodeled so our guests were thrilled.  All our catering services were out of this world! Clenliness was on point. The team went out of their way to assist us with many last minute requests. My saving graces were Lexa and Jean! Thank you ladies for helping to pull off nothing short or a miracle.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent business conference at the Embassy Suites Anaheim North.  Our Team takes pride in delivering detailed and special service and I am so happy to hear that you were able to see and enjoy this first hand.  It can be challenging to plan a conference (especially on short notice) and it sounds like you were able to enjoy and relax during the experience due to our exceptional staff.  This is how it is supposed to be and I am thrilled that we delivered on our promise to you.  We look forward to seeing you again for your next meeting.  Thank you for your valued business!

Summary: Had a very nice day and peaceful rest as I had just celebrated my 58th birthday with a spur of the moment overnight getaway with my spouse. The room was clean, the staff was polite, and the items hotels are charging for now i.e. parking, resort fees, internet ect. were complementary which was pleasant.
Manager Response: Our Team could not be happier to hear that your 58th Birthday Celebration at the Embassy Suites Anaheim North was a blast.  Our Team really enjoyed interacting with you and your family during your special weekend.  Thank you for your delightful feedback.  Looking forward to seeing you again next time.

Summary: Its clean and good place to stay with family and children, the stuff were friendly ... the lobby outside the suits need to cool it more as it was very hot , Room service stuff need more training as they didn't clean the room well

The Embassy suite is always prof to me that they are one of the best affordable hotel brands. They made our vacation wonderful with the hot breakfast , heated pool and shuttle to Disney. The staff is very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you and your family had such a great experience while staying with us.  Thank you for your delightful feedback and for your valued business!

Summary: I started off coming here due to fire evacuations in Anaheim Hills and Orange.  The kids had no clue of the danger of our home only that we got to go to Embassy Suites when we were evacuated 3 times, our dog and all!   For their birthdays they wanted to come back and rent a room or two, so we did with pizza from the kitchen, arcade games, the indoor pool,  and of course the most amazing breakfast I have ever had from an OC hotel! The kids and I came back for their birthdays for about 4 -5 years with my four sons.  I would think they were tired of us, but they were always extremely cordial and patient with the boys. I would highly recommend this hotel for relaxation, fun and a great meal,  but most importantly making good memories with your children.
Manager Response: We are just thrilled to hear that your Family enjoyed your stay with us and that our Hotel Team delivered on our promise yet again to provide an excellent experience all around.....and even better as you mentioned "every time you stay with us".  As General Manager of the Hotel it pleases me to hear that things happen as they should while our guests are staying with us. Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business over the years!  Looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: My overall experience was good.  The only complaint I would have about the hotel is they offer complimentary breakfast and a complimentary happy hour alcoholic drinks and snacks are provided.  But when I requested water to my room I was charged $2.00 per bottle that made no sense to me.  The ac was on when I went in the room but smelled musty.  Other than that the room was descent and location was where I needed to be.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests so we will certainly consider your suggestions. Thank you for your valued business!

Summary: The housekeeping and lack of attention by the front desk staff gives the Embassy North a thumbs down from our family & an adjoining family in another room. We usually stay at the Embassy South in Anaheim. In this case, we booked the North due to a price break for our lengthy stay. Should of paid the extra.   Dirty smokers balcony not cleaned at checkin. Major spider webs and bird feces. Asked to be cleaned early so we could come back and it would be done, nope. Had to call and request again. They swept up the cigarette butts but left the spider webs and feces.  Left a tip for the housekeeping. They thanked us by leaving their 1/2 empty cup next to the money location.  Stained sheets!  Called for a blanket last night, they never came. We had to get blanket from the car to go over
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished.  This is certainly not our goal as we are in the process of enhancing our Hotel for our guests.   Considering our guestrooms were just completely remodeled we were surprised to hear this feedback.  I assure you that we will take all of your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement in the future.  We hope that after our Hotel enhancement project that you will consider staying with us again so we can show you what our Hotel and Team are truly made of. Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: I am extremely happy with the services provided by embassy!! Food was tasteful and fresh, rooms are extremely clean and well taken care of.  The services and the staff really made my stay a great one. while on business I will always choose Embassy Suites first whether I am on business or with my family because of the consistent Quality of amenities and friendly staff.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us while traveling on business.  We hope it was a successful trip for you and your company.  Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business!  Looking forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Doesn't get much better than this!
Summary: Stayed here on 8/10/15 and was taken back by the amazing customer service. My mother had surgery at a nearby hospital and the staff here did everything possible to ensure she was comfortable during her stay. Diane and Diana at the front desk were incredible. Not only did they arrange a room for her that was within close proximity to the main entrance but also asked after her in the morning to see how she was feeling.  Cisco in Bistro 3100 rushed a food order and some coffee to her when she returned to the hotel and offered to have the chef cook anything she desired whether it was on the menu or not. The newly remodeled room was clean and well equipped and the overall appearance of the hotel was very nice. I have stayed in 5 star hotels that did not come close to the customer
Manager Response: As General Manager of the Hotel it gives me great pleasure to read a review such as yours.  I could not be happier to hear that we were able provide the attention to detail that you and your mother deserve.  Being away from home during a difficult time can be stressful however it sounds like we were able to make our hotel your "Home Away From Home".  After all this is what the Hospitality business is all about.  I will be sure to personally and specifically thank Diane, Diana and Cisco for helping to make your time with us so comfortable. Thank you for your delightful feedback.

Summary: We moved from another hotel to  this one so all the family could be together. We were  there (California) for a funeral. upon arrival oir room wasn't quite ready, we were early. But the  desk clerk was extremely  nice  during  our wait. Once in the room, we found it clean with a very  comfortable  king sized  bed. The chaise lounge  was a bit stained, but they are a family-friendly  hotel. There was one little problem with  a lock with one of the relatives  but that was taken care of right away  Overall I would stay again  in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: We are just thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our Team was so hospitable with you and your family. Our Team takes great pride in the Hotel and truly enjoys connecting with our guests.  Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business!

Summary Heading: Good Value, But Several Minor Problems
Summary: The value was good, as was the location (close to Disneyland, not too far from the beach). But there were so many little things wrong with our experience, that it started to impede on our enjoyment.  We had a light that didn't work, a leak in the bathroom sink that soaked all of our things on the counter, hot water only in the kitchenette (not a bit of cold to speak of), wifi that didn't work with our Hilton Honors membership as promised, three towels for six people (we had to ask for extra every day) -- all minor issues on their own, but compounded really started to bother us.  The continental breakfast was quite good, and the price of our suite was very affordable. I'm just not sure it was worth the money we saved for all the hassle we had to go through. The bed was very
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear that you feel your stay was a good value.  We apologize however that you had some service inconsistencies during your stay.  We are always striving to improve our service offerings so we thank you for making us aware. We do hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area. All the best!

Summary Heading: The worst hotel, I have ever stayed at!
Summary: My friend was getting married at a few miles from this hotel and she chose this one to act as a host hotel. She said she had heard good things about it and that it was one of the "nicer" hotels in that proximity.   Lets start with check in, my friends mother found maggots in her coffee filter. ARE YOU KIDDING ME?!!!  Her toilet overflowed and so did her tub.   My room wasn't ready until after 4PM, when they guarantee a check in at 3PM.   The carpet was wet in the main bedroom.   Their elevators are a complete joke! It took me 10 mins to get from the 6th floor to the 2nd.   Oh how about this... i walked to the ice machine and near the vending and ice machines housekeeping had all of their dirty carts piled. You could barely walk through and there was a mountain of trash in the

The suite was very clean and comfortable. The overall service at this hotel was excellent. I would recommend Embassy Suites to my family and friends. The made to order complementary breakfast was a great way to start the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.   I’m glad to hear you received excellent service during your recent stay!  We are also happy to hear that you were comfortable in our newly renovated suites. More importantly - we truly appreciate you recommending us to your family and friends!  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I was very surprised at the issues at this Embassy Suites, as they are typically great hotels.  The bed was comfortable, but that was about it. I got a different room than what I pre-checked in to, and when I asked about it, the guy just smiled.  No hair dryer in the room!  Thankfully I saw this before getting in the shower, as I would have been very upset had I washed my hair, then not have been able to dry my hair before leaving for the airport. When I called the front desk, the guy told me they were full, so he doubted they had any in lock-up.  He said he could look but it would take awhile as the housecleaning crew was not in yet.  I didn't have that kind of time, so had to go without washing my hair today.  The air conditioner was not able to be changed; The shower head was
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished.  This is certainly not our goal and for this we do apologize.  Rest assured that we have looked into each and every item that you mentioned and have made adjustments where applicable.  We take your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement.

Summary: Evidently no on in this hotel knows how to assess room charges and bill them correctly to your charge card.  I have never seen such inept processes and lack of staff intelligence when it comes to final billing. I will never come here again, mainly because they don't know how to correct their mistakes once they have made them.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty to the Hilton Family of brands. Please accept my apologies for the billing difficulties you experienced recently.  It is my understanding that our manager has compensated you appropriately for the difficulty you encountered.   We hope you will give us another opportunity to provide you with excellent service. Thank you again for your comment

Summary Heading: I don't think this Embassy suites will be around for long
Summary: I feel like the brand has stopped caring about this hotel, and I suspect they will sell it in the future. There was a lack of care about anything. The room smelled horrible and had rat droppings all over the balcony, and when I asked for the manager, he just said, "sorry about that." There aren't even any fish or turtles in the water in the lobby. Nothing about this place rings of Embassy suites.

The hotel says it has shuttle service to and from Disneyland, and it does, but what they don't tell you is that there is no service between 11:00 a.m. and 4:00 p.m.!  And it costs you to use this service!  Also no airport shuttle.  The hotel is nice and they are updating. It is about 15 min. to Disneyland park by shuttle.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the hotel with exception to the Anaheim Transit shuttle service hours.  We are sorry if this caused any inconvenience to you. Thank you for your valued business and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Hotel was as expected for Embassy brand.  I love the opened feeling in this hotel with all the rooms around the outside.  Complimentary Breakfast was great before long day at client site.  Rooms were awesome and roomy and bed was very comfortable
Manager Response: Thank you for your GREAT feedback!  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and our newly renovated guestrooms. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: The hotel was excellent.  The rooms are very nice and spacious.  The complimentary breakfast was good and perfect to start our day at Disneyland. The atmosphere of the hotel was nice as well.  It gives you the feeling of outdoors without actually being outdoors.
Manager Response: Our Team could not be happier to hear that your recent stay with us was "EXCELLENT".  Thank you for your delightful feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: I was charged a extra $500 on my bank card by mistake from this hotel, which ruined my day at DisneyLand. Though they were able to clear up this issue that night, the damage had already been done....Watch your Bill!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with exception to the credit card authorization that was mis-held.  I am happy to hear that we rectified this quickly and am sincerely sorry that this caused any inconvenience to you.  Thank you for your valued business!

Summary: We only stayed one night. Everything was clean and comfortable. I enjoy embassy suites because of the size of the space and the separation of the rooms. Everything was clean and the front desk was helpful. Side note if you join Hilton honors you receive free wifi. Our room was on the freeway side of the hotel, it was noisy.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and do appreciate your feedback about our newly renovated guestrooms and great HHonors benefits.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Not for a business traveller, however, I had business in Anaheim.  Hotel was full and food was left in the hallway for so long, I had to mention it to the front desk - elevators took forever because of the amount of people - wouldn't go back because of the amount of traffic
Manager Response: Thank you for your business during our busiest month of the year.  We appreciate your feedback and will certainly consider this as we continually work towards assuring our guests comfort and satisfaction.

Summary: The staff was friendly. However this hotel was very dirty, from the rooms, to the floors on every floor outside the rooms. For the price I think you can find a cleaner hotel to stay at. It was close to the Disneyland park, however a long ways to get any needed supplies like asprin or antacids as they do not stock them.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback of your recent stay with us. We sincerely apologize for the housekeeping issues that you experienced; our hotel works hard to ensure the comfort and satisfaction of our guests and we are very sorry that did not meet your expectations. I hope that if you travels bring you back to the area that you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: The room had a moldy smell that only got worse throughout the stay. we ran out of tissues & TP on the first day & had to track down the housekeeping staff to get someone to replace them...they just didn't replace them with the normal housekeeping service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests and provide additional training for our team members.  We are sorry to hear that your stay with us was not consistent in service or expectation.  This is certainly not our goal when taking care of our guests.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future so we can turn your impression of us into a positive one

Summary: Place looks great after renovation. Staff  is very helpful and willing to go out of their way.  Room smells clean and is clean.  Great Hot breakfast!! We enjoyed our stay :-) We will be back when we are in the area again!!!!!
Manager Response: Our Team could not be happier to learn of your great feedback about your recent stay with us.  Our goal is to assure all of our guests feel as comfortable and happy as possible.  We are looking forward to seeing you again during your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Ask for a room close to the front
Summary: This hotel is actually very nice. The staff is very helpful and polite. Everyone greats you with a smile. The only issue is if your room is on the back of the hotel. There is a recycling plant behind the hotel that operates 24 hours a day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to enjoy our super fantastic and hospitable team members.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: We had a great stay just one small problem but it was handled right away.. Breakfast is always good eating area is clean as well as the rooms. Quite at night for a good night sleep.. Can't wait to stay at a Embassy suit again..
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to make things right for you when the opportunity presented itself.  Thank you for your valued business and we look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: We had excellent time in California  , never before like this time at Embassy Suites. The breakfast and the employe made our stay better than expected. The pool was very clean  and in general  the hotel was in very good condition.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear of your EXCELLENT stay while at our Hotel.  Thank you for your feedback we truly appreciate it.  See you next time!

Summary: The Embassy Suites is one of my favorite hotel chains because of the spacious rooms, the great breakfasts, and the striking atrium design. This particular location hits all of those points and then some.  OVERALL LOCATION  This is designated Anaheim North, and it is indeed in the city of Anaheim, but right on the edge between Anaheim and Placentia. However, for Disneyland access, the local Anaheim Resort Transit (ART) does make a stop here.  This Embassy Suites shares a parking lot with a night club (XALOS), which is open Thursday-Sunday. I haven't stayed along the wing that faces the night club, but I didn't hear anything at all in my rooms, and I've stayed here a few times.  On the nights that the nightclub is open, private security patrols the hotel perimeter - mostly, I
Manager Response: We are just thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our Team was so hospitable with you and your family. Our Team takes great pride in the Hotel and truly enjoys connecting with our guests.  Thank you for your detailed feedback and for your valued business!

Summary: Needed a hotel in the Anaheim area for a short trip to the Los Angeles area. This property is good. Friendly staff, clean rooms and great breakfast area. Room was spacious and very comfortable. View is not nice, but I wasn't staying there for the view. Beds comfortable.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us that you had such a great experience.  Thank you for your delightful feedback and for your business!

Summary: There were signs hanging saying that this hotel is in the process of a major renovation but we did not experience any construction inconvenience. Looked like the public areas weren't started yet.  This Embassy still has the traditional "Embassy waterways/bridges/vegetation." Pros:   -Convenient location right off the highway   -Complimentary hot breakfast was good   -Our room was partially updated. Looked to have newer furnishings, carpet   -Our suite was large (603)   -Comforter and pillows nice   -Kids enjoyed the pullout sofa bed.  Was told the mattress was better than the one they used at another Embassy the past 4 nights.   -Pool was nice although they ran completely out of towels before we left. Their was a staff member in the pool area cleaning up while we were there but
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests and improve upon our service and hotel offerings. Thank you for your valued business!

Summary Heading: One of the better Embassy Suites I've been to.
Summary: We stayed at this hotel with family for three nights on a recent trip to Disneyland. My in-laws chose the hotel for all of us, so we were not involved in the booking process or the cost of the room. However, we tend to like Embassy Suites, and this is definitely one of the nicer ones.   The rooms at this hotel have been recently remodeled and look great. They are as large and spacious as you would expect from an ES - with the lounge area having a full size sleeper sofa as usual, however the sofa itself was large which was nice. My two nieces slept on our lounge sleeper sofa while my husband, myself, and our two year old daughter slept in the bedroom (the latter in a pack n play which fit comfortably in the bedroom area). My only complaint about the room configuration is that it
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us while traveling with your family.   Thank you for your feedback and for your loyalty to Embassy Suites!  We are looking forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: We had an overall great experience at this hotel. The location was perfect for us, because we booked it for access to multiple locations, Disneyland, Los Angeles, and San Diego. I found the location to be perfect for what we wanted it for. There are no views available, but for about $200 more per night you can have a view of Disneyland down the street. It pains me to see people blasting this place for location and views but they don't want to pay the $400 per night at Disneyland. The rooms were clean, the beds were comfortable, and the room fit my party of 5 wonderfully. We picked Embassy for their suites than accommodate my party size. The breakfast was awesome. Free breakfast with many choices, including build your omelet. One morning they had a problem running out of food for
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us and that see the great value, and location we offer.  Thank you for your additional feedback for improvement as we sincerely consider all of our guests comments to help us better our offerings.  We are looking forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: I stayed here for business. If one night is an indication the majority of folks stay here for vacation at the Disneyland parks.   The room is clean, the staff is great, the suites have a great breakfast.and mgrs reception. And for you vacationers it's close to Disneyland.   Heads up business folks, plan on all the trimmings associated with vacationing families, we know about that.   For vacationers, there are plenty of hotels right in the same area, so shop if money matters. There are shuttles.to Disney I'd use.   One caution, if internet speed matters to business travelers you can get email but no self-conferencing and for families don't plan on Netflix etc. Either their network is to.slow or overloaded...  If you need decent internet the doubletree 2 miles away is just a.touch
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests. Thank you for your valued business!

Summary: This review is for the Embassy Suites Anaheim North only as I have stayed at other Embassy Suites before and it can be a decent deal depending on the price you can get it for and if that location charges for parking and if you take advantage of the breakfast and attend the complimentary managers reception with free alcoholic beverages.  The breakfast includes made to order omelets or fresh eggs. Egg whites are available if you don't get there too late. Also bacon, sausage, potatoes, pancakes or French toast, fruit, oatmeal, cereal, yogurt, pastries, toast, bagels, etc. juices, soda, milk and coffee. But if you stay for an extended stay, the menu can get old unless you are used to eating breakfast like this everyday. All embassy suites that I have been to has this standard menu.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests.  We will sincerely consider all of your feedback.  Thank you for your valued business!

Summary: This is our second time staying here.  We enjoyed our visit the first time that we all decided to stay here again. Close to Disney Land, Just a short shuttle ride from the hotel – very pleasant drivers – made the ride fun (small fee round trip) no seat belts, had to hold the kids on our laps.  The hotel has a pleasant ambiance.  My grandchildren really enjoyed the atrium.  The hotel is very kid friendly.  Rooms were clean; bed was comfortable with nice linens and nice size if you are sharing. The master room has a door for privacy.  Great breakfast, get there early as the line for the freshly prepared omelets and the made to order eggs will build up fast. Juice was a little watered down. The nightly reception was a welcome treat after the afternoon at Disney Land. We will stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests. Thank you for your valued business!

Summary: Big time Excellent experiences, we always go back to Embassy suites! Two times a year for Disneyland, Best place for the family, Best hotel and very good services, Thank you Embassy Suites till next time!
Manager Response: From our Team to you and your Family...THANK YOU!  We are so happy that you enjoyed your "Excellent" stay and our Hotel.  Thank you for your loyalty.

Summary: The breakfast and Manager's specials were great. Staff was friendly. I stayed in room 705 from 6/11/15-6/20/15. During this time, the room was very hard to keep cool. The bathroom had a constant scent of sewerage. I called the front desk on day 2 or 3 of the trip. Staff came and put toilet cleaner in the toilet...It did not work. We had to deal with this the entire trip. Also, the balconies and stairwells are infested with HUGE spiders and cobwebs. I dont think staff cleans these areas at all.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that our complimentary made to order breakfast, evening reception, and Hotel Staff were "great"! Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with additional feedback about your guestroom and stairwells as this allows us to follow up on these items to better our service in the future.  Thank you for your valued business!

Summary Heading: Awesome Service and a Clean Comfortable Room
Summary: The staff was was friendly and very helpful.  The rooms were clean.  The complimentary breakfast was great.  The General Manager and Chef both went out of their way to ask how everything was.  Couldn't ask for a better place to stay at a reasonable rate.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure connecting with you during your recent stay with us.  Our Team is thrilled to hear of your wonderful feedback.  We look forward to seeing you during your next visit.

Summary: Unhappy with my stay and will not stay again. Was assigned a handicapped room. Requested to change but was denied. Did not even know how to use a handicapped shower. Felt like I was camping. The bedding or the cleaning solutions they use caused me to sneeze all night long so I was unable to sleep. I stayed there because I was having work done in my home and the paint was making me sneeze. I would have been better off saving the money and staying at home.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations during your mini "stay-cation".  The hotel was completely sold out on the evening of your stay.  At the time you requested to change rooms we did not have another room available to move you into.  We are sorry that this caused you to be uncomfortable.  We do appreciate your feedback, thank you!

Summary: Stayed here to take my 10 yr. old daughter to Disneyland. Great hotel, less than 10 minutes from everything Disney. Evening reception was great as well as the complimentary cooked breakfast. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are just thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our Team was so hospitable with you and your family. Our Team takes great pride in the Hotel and truly enjoys connecting with our guests.  Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business!

Summary: I've stayed in several Embassy Suites and this one by far was my least favorite.  Stayed here with my child's middle school band group on a field trip to Disneyland.  These kids worked hard to earn this trip.  I, along with several students, had problems with this hotel.  It is the hotel their school has used several times, but I would not stay here again, especially for a family trip.  First, there is a "gentleman's club" across the parking lot.  The kids thought this was humorous, but I didn't not appreciate this being in close proximity of a family hotel.  Location to Disneyland NOT ideal.  When checking in, the card key one group of students had did not work (they were given 4 room keys and not one worked).  So they had to wait 20 minutes in the hallway after a long day's
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are saddened to hear that your recent stay did not meet your expectations. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests.  We will sincerely consider all of your feedback.  Thank you for your valued business!

Summary: If you are expecting the experience and decor that you used to get at an EMBASSY SUITES, you are in for disappointment!  They have RUINED what people loved about these hotels.  They are remodeling them and turning what used to be hotels with a beautiful, unique garden/European decor into stark, cold, ugly hotels.  It is very sad.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We will certainly share this with the Embassy Brand.  Our hotel enhancements are not quite complete yet.  We think that once everything is 100% complete and you have a chance to take in all of the wonderful upgrades you will be very pleased.

Summary: We stayed at Embassy Suites North in Anaheim by default through Costco travel package.  My family of 6 found the room to be quite comfortable, especially the beds!  My grandson who slept on the pull out sofa claimed it to be the most comfortable bed ever.  The breakfast was good, although it is really spread out which makes it difficult to get your plate in one trip.  There was a lack of seating most mornings with many people taking trays of food up to their rooms.  Breakfast hours started at 6am which is the same time as the bus to Disneyland for Magic Mornings, so no free breakfast our first morning.  There really isn't much to eat around the restaurant either.  The bathtub was slow draining but eventually drained. The housekeeping did a fantastic job even leaving plenty of
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear of your GREAT stay while at our Hotel.  Thank you for your feedback we truly appreciate it.  See you next time!

Summary: We stayed at the Embassy Anaheim North for 17 days and loved it.  The rooms were very clean and so was the entire hotel.  Staff was very friendly and helpful especially Alex at the Front Desk.  Loved the morning breakfast and the variety was great.  Would definately stay at this resort again when we come back in February.
Manager Response: Our Team could not be happier to hear that your extended stay with us was enjoyable and that you were comfortable throughout.   Thank you for your delightful feedback and your loyalty.  Looking forward to seeing you again in February.

Summary: Overall experience excellent. Beautiful hotel, awesome breakfast, very nice staff! Shower had a bit low water pressure but okay. Had problems with toilet not flushing. Staff helpful and friendly. I would definitely stay here again and again!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay while at our Hotel.  We too think our Hotel is looking beautiful with our recent hotel enhancements and are glad that you feel the same way.  Thank you for your feedback we truly appreciate it.  See you next time!

Summary Heading: Embassy Suite North Orange in Anaheim
Summary: Not up to par with the normal quality of an Embassy Suite hotel. Curtains had holes in them. Noise level from outside industry made it hard to sleep. Breakfast was disappointing. Food was dry. Juice was warm. eggs were not cooked all the way.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished.  This is certainly not our goal and for this we do apologize.  The “happenings” you shared with us we rarely hear (if at all).  Rest assured that we have looked into each and every item that you mentioned and have made adjustments where applicable.  We take your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement.

Summary: My newly renovated room smelled like an old damp musty room.  I was shocked when the person at the desk told me it was newly renovated.  Mattress had a big dent in it as well.  Bathroom was not updated.  The shower would not drain.  I had to shower in standing water each time I took a shower.  I complained about it twice but it was never attended to.
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations during your recent stay with us.  Every one of our guestrooms and bathrooms has been renovated.  Thank you for making us aware of your shower draining slowly.  We are sorry that this was not addressed during your stay as this clearly has changed your perception of the Hotel and this is not our goal.  Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: Avoid the rooms at the back of the hotel.  The large recycle center next to the hotel seems to operate all night and you can hear the constant beep of the trucks backing up.  The hotel did change our room after the first night and the hotel staff were very good about it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and are glad that we were able to Make Things Right for you by moving you to a room that would assure your family a great nights rest.  We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary Heading: DO NOT STAY HERE!   They have a nightclub in the parking lot
Summary: Do not stay at this Embassy Suites.  They have a huge nightclub that is directly across the front of the hotel in the parking lot.  "IN" the parking lot means it is actually in the same lot as your hotel, on the premises.  During club nights the lot is full of club goers and so many cars that you have to park in the back. We drove from Albuquerque to Anaheim and were very tired and ready for a good nights sleep.  During our first night my wife and I were woken at 2am by a fight between a man and a women in one of the adjacent rooms. We called security and nothing was done. This lasted for almost an hour. When I called the manager the next day they didn't even have it logged that we called.  It was horrible, it sounded like a woman was getting beat up. And it's no coincidence
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished.  This is certainly not our goal and for this we do apologize.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again so we can show you a positive experience similar to what so many other guests are sharing while staying with us.

Summary Heading: Remodel helping to improve this place
Summary: The accommodations at the Embassy Suites were actually better than we expected.  The bed was very comfortable and the spaciousness of the room with a separate living room and bedroom didn't make us feel cramped at all.  The bathroom was surprisingly a little cramped considering the amount of space in the rest of the room.  We loved that we left a note when making the reservation that we were celebrating our wedding anniversary in California, and the hotel had left a bottle of champagne, on ice, in our living room.  That was a nice touch, especially with the rose that accompanied the bottle.  If you've been to other Embassy Suites, this one feels about the same for the lounging area and the layout of the ground floor.  The part that was definitely different was that the parking
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us while enjoying your anniversary vacation.  HAPPY ANNIVERSARY!!!  Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business!  Looking forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Our 3rd stay here with a school group and the best
Summary: We have stayed here every year that we take our middle school band to Disneyland for a music clinic.  This is my third time chaperoning, and I was the parent organizing our hotel stay.  Everything went smoothly because of the excellent coordination and communication with the hotel.  The kids and adult chaperones all had a great stay here.  The hotel is almost finished with their remodel of this property, and all the changes are excellent.  The whole atmosphere is improved.  While this hotel is about 15 minutes from Disneyland, it is fairly priced and met all of our needs for a 2 night trip with 40 kids and 10 adults.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to our Hotel.  We sure enjoy having your school group stay with us time and time again.  Looking forward to seeing you next time!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay and a little out of the way....
Summary: Nice clean hotel.  Friendly staff.  Good breakfast and manager's happy hour.  It's a little bit out of the way from the hustle and bustle of the Disneyland area, but just a few minutes away from where you need to go.  Probably time for some updates/remodel soon.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear of your GREAT stay while at our Hotel.  Thank you for your feedback we truly appreciate it.  See you next time!

Summary: The rooms were large and the beds were super comfortable. We also had a pull out bed in the couch. The shared bathroom was in the bedroom part of the room, which was a but awkward, but it was also large and nicely appointed. The hotel was in the process of renovation but we didn't experience any construction. We loved the happy hour, free drinks and the food from the restaurant was delicious, yet a bit expensive.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed the three pillars of experience make Embassy Suites...an "Embassy Suites"; One Bedroom Suites, Complimentary Cooked to order Breakfast, and our  Complimentary Evening Reception.  We understand that not only are these perks important but they must be enjoyable as well.  We are so glad you had a nice time while staying with us.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: I am writing this review because I believe in giving credit where credit is due rather than only posting reviews to make a complaint. My boyfriend and I checked into this Embassy Suites after a long car ride. My boyfriend forgot his toothbrush at home and it was 330am. We were both too tired to drive anywhere to buy a tooth brush. We got checked in at the front desk by Jimmy Angelo. We originally asked him for a toothbrush. Much to our disappointment, he broke the news to us that they did not have any accessible toothbrushes at the moment as they had run out of the ones behind the desk. We must have looked like a kid that was just told there was no Santa Clause because we checked into our room and what do you know.!the phone rings. Surprise! Our savior Jimmy was able to look
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful and candid review of our Hotel.  We know that traveling can be challenging...this is why we love what we do...once the traveling part if over we have the great pleasure of taking special care of our guests once they arrive at the Hotel.  We are happy to hear that our team members, and especially Jimmy took such good care of you.

Summary: My family and I had a great experience at this hotel.  The hotel staff worked hard to provide excellent service for the demands of the hotel guests.  In my opinion, this operation will rate as a 5-Star hotel because of the upcoming $10M in hotel upgrades and renovations.  We will return to this location in the near future.  Thank you, Michael Haney.
Manager Response: "5 STAR" - Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you also for your feedback about our Hotel enhancement project, we are glad that you enjoyed the upgrades.  Looking forward to seeing you next time!

Summary: We love staying at Embassy Suites hotels. The breakfast is always great! The customer service is great as well. The location was perfect for going to Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Our Hotel Team could not be happier to hear that you had such a nice experience while staying with us.  Thank you for your delightful feedback and for your valued business!

Summary: Good location, clean and comfortable. Nice pool and hot tub. Pillows and bed just okay. A/C not too great. Cool balconies, nice décor, nice furniture and furnishings. Friendly staff. Breakfast was average but staff was super nice. Plenty of seating for breakfast. Good room service menu with some interesting and tasty options not just the hum drum you usually see. Was really nice to be able to eat and drink in pool area. Makes it so much more convenient when vacationing with kids.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear of your GREAT stay while at our Hotel.  Thank you for your feedback we truly appreciate it.  See you next time!

Summary: Room was clean and modern (size typical for E.S.), staff was friendly, had an indoor pool, and had a nice complementary hot/cold breakfast bar.  Shuttle to Disneyland is $5 a day and takes about 15-20mins.  Their heating/cooling system is set-up so that the whole hotel can only either use the heaters or coolers (so when it is colder out the hotel heating system is on and when warmer the cooling system). Meaning you can only control the temp. in your room to a point.  Would stay again.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear of your GREAT stay while at our Hotel.  Thank you for your feedback we truly appreciate it.  See you next time!

Summary: We chose this stay due to friends in town using the same location. Room was neat, clean, and quiet while a number of bus loads of students were stay there.  The staff offer a meeting room for our friends gathering.  And morning breakfast was wonderful.  One room issue, some of the room light switches were mounted upside down, and the shower water temp indicator was backwards.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear of your GREAT stay while at our Hotel.  Thank you for your feedback we truly appreciate it.  See you next time!

Summary: The rooms are a very nice size and very comfortable.  The free breakfast buffet was great.  The hotel is in a great location conveniently located to Disney and many restaurants, stores, etc.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for your business.  We are so happy that your enjoyed your stay with us.  Looking forward to seeing you on your next visit.

Summary: we stay here because it is close to Disneyland, and their shuttle takes visitors directly to the park, saving us the hassle of finding parking. Complimentary breakfast is the best, with plenty of time to eat before leaving for the park. The interior of the hotel is beautiful, and we like the evening glass of wine surrounded by a lovely environment. Clean rooms and wonderful staff.
Manager Response: We are just thrilled to hear that your family enjoyed your stay with us and that our Hotel Team delivered on our promise to provide an excellent experience all around.  As General Manager of the Hotel it pleases me to hear that things happen as they should while our guests are staying with us. Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business!

Summary: We always try to find an Embassy Suites to stay at when traveling. This hotel lived up to what we have come to love about Embassy Suites. The big rooms, comfortable beds, free breakfast, evening reception and helpful, friendly staff. It has undergone major renovations and we were there to see the final touches on the beautiful new lobby. Another bonus with this hotel was the free parking unlike the other two Embassy Suites in the area. However, it would have been nice if internet was included. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We are just thrilled that we had the opportunity to have you stay with us and that your experience was "great".  We try our best to assure that our ongoing hotel renovation enhancements do not affect our guests negatively and are happy to hear that you were able to still enjoy the Hotel and your vacation during our ongoing refurbishment project.

Summary: It was a pleasure staying at this Embassy Suites.  The morning breakfast lived up to expectations.  The room was comfortable.  Only downside was the view.  I was looking at work in a trash compaction company.  The interactive map during digital check-in should be improved to tell the type of view for each room.  Otherwise, there are no other complaints.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and do appreciate your feedback about the e-check in experience.  Thank you for your valued business!

Summary: Our first room, a non-smoking room, smelled heavy like cigarette smoke, so we went back to the front desk. The front desk girl was very kind and changed our room. But the rest of my party witnessed the sales manager roll her eyes to the other front desk clerk as if to say, yea right. Not a great leader to your team, very unprofessional. We ate at the onsite Bistro restaurant. It was average. Eat out by the pond, much nicer atmosphere. Free breakfast was nice. Made to order eggs, etc. The bed is comfy with a combination of down pillows and foam pillows. Rooms are spacious with a living room and a bedroom. One morning they forget to leave bar soap and the next morning they forgot to leave shampoo. Hotel is dated but going through a remodel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests and provide additional training for our team members.  We are sorry to hear that your stay with us was not consistent.  This is certainly not our goal when servicing our guests.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future so we can turn your impression of us into a positive one.

Summary: Hotel was in a good location for our business trip and overall convenient to all local attractions. Interstate side of hotel had a lot of traffic noise but was tolerable. Hotel was going through a lobby renovation but staff was very efficient during this process. I would stay again and recommend to anyone looking for a nice hotel.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us while traveling on business.  We hope it was a successful trip for you.  Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business!  Looking forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Staff was unfriendly. Watched me struggle getting in the front door with luggage and bell cart. Hotel was under construction although I was charged a higher rate than originally quoted. Hotel shares parking lot with large night club and club goers get front parking while guest are directed to park in the side back of lot and the side and back lobby doors are locked. This was not the location closest to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: We stayed here for our Disneyland. It's a short drive & away from all the Disney congestion! Room was fairly large & clean. The staff was always very kind & helpful. They gave our little one a Disney gift upon arrival. The breakfast was delicious & a great way to start the day. We were rarely back for the managers reception, but did enjoy the snacks when we were. The pool area was clean as well. Parking on the weekends is a bit of a challenge with the nightclub next door.
Manager Response: We are just thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our Team was so hospitable with you and your family. Our Team takes great pride in the Hotel and truly enjoys connecting with our guests.  Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business!

Summary: I've spent a total of 6 nights at this hotel on two separate trips. It's a beautiful building, great staff, comfortable beds, and awesome breakfast choices. I will stay at this hotel again when circumstances permit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide the Hotel with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We truly feel that "feedback is a gift" that allows us opportunities to best take care of our guests. Thank you for your valued business!

Summary: We have stayed here many times and have never been let down.  Clean rooms, friendly staff, INCREDIBLE breakfast! This hotel is within 5 minutes of Target, VONs (Groocery) 30 minutes from Newport beach and close to Disney. Love the area, you can walk by the riverside in the morning!
Manager Response: It must be said that you made the General Managers day today when reading your review stating that the Embassy Suites Anaheim North is the "Best Hotel in Orange County". We are thrilled to hear this feedback and are happy that you clearly appreciate all of the great things our hotel has to offer.  Thank you for your loyalty.  We look forward to seeing you again next time.

Summary Heading: Wish it wasn't next to the nightclub
Summary: I am a regular ES guest as the layout is very convenient for my family and I don't have to worry about breakfast for the kids.  I called a month, two weeks and a week before check-in to confirm the construction progress and I was assured all the rooms had been renovated, and only the lobby area was affected by the construction.  This was true when we arrived, and although our room on the 6th floor was renovated, it had a weird, moldy smell. I noticed it would go away when we'd turn the air on, but every time we returned to the room, I noticed the smell.  There's no way to know if it was just our room.  Also, our towels were not replenished after the first night, and when I called down to the front, no one ever came to bring any like they said they would.  After the second night,
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished.  This is certainly not our goal and for this we do apologize.  Rest assured  that we take feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement in the future. Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: We stayed here on our trip to Disneyland. We chose this Embassy Suites because the beds were Queen size, versus the Embassy Suites near Disneyland (double beds). It is a little far from the park, but not too bad of a drive (maybe 15 minutes to the parking area). They are currently remodeling this hotel, but that didn't affect our stay. The rooms were clean, and quiet. The food was very good, and the staff polite and professional.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We recently upgraded our double bed rooms to Queens.  We are happy to hear that you noticed this and that you were comfortable during your recent stay with us.  Looking forward to seeing you next time.

Summary: The hotel is going under some renovations but it was not a big deal or interfere with our stay.  The hotel is beautiful and the staff helpful.  Overall our stay was great!  The beds are so comfortable.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for your loyalty.  We are so happy that you will be joining us again during your future travels to Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed here to celebrate BOTH of our daughter's (8 and 11) birthdays in Disney. Right from the start they were extremely helpful. Our room got upgraded to a larger room when we checked in early.  (We were worried that we would have to wait all day to check in, after arriving early from our 13 hour drive from Oregon. We were just tired and wanting to unpack our things. Being able to check in early was such a blessing! And the larger room was WONDERFUL. Aside from the gorgeous hotel, accommodating staff, and extras (their huge breakfast is a fabulous start to a long day at Disney! And their Managers Reception is a wonderful way to wind down, after a long DAY at Disney!) their Director of Sales (Alexa) heard that we were celebrating our daughter's birthdays. She brought them a
Manager Response: As General Manager of the Hotel it could not make me happier to learn that our Team provided an A+ experience to you and your family during your recent stay.  We love celebrating exciting life events with our guests.  Hearing your positive feedback and how our actions positively affected your family is the "Hospitality" we strive to provide to all of our guests.  We are so happy that you were able to experience our very special Hospitality during your visit.

Summary: Easy access to freeway; close to attractions but not so close as to get priced out; good value for the dollar.  Beautiful interior design of the common areas. Extremely courteous and helpful staff.  Didn't take advantage of the Manager's Reception but the area looked very inviting.  Breakfast was GREAT!  Good variety to choose from and everything that was supposed to be hot was hot!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about our Hotel and your recent stay with us.  We are thrilled that you had a great stay and we look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.  Thank you for your loyalty.

Summary: Even with renovations, our experience with this hotel was lovely. The staff was incredibly helpful and the facility was clean and pleasant. If in the LA or Anaheim area again, I will definitely return here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valued business and for the wonderful feedback about our Hotel and your recent family vacation.  We look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.

Summary: Great experience. The rooms where just so amazing.  Food was amazing. The breakfast was to die for! The pools and spas were perfect. I did not want to leave. I will definitely be coming back in the near future!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you were able to experience our Hotel in the way you deserve to during your vacation.  An EXCELLENT stay is exactly what we aim for in serving our guests.  Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you next time.

Summary: Convenient to Disneyland and other attractions.  Service staff is very attentive.  Very good breakfast and great location.  Clean and family friendly.  Great pool for family use.  15 minutes from Disney and less than an hour from Universal and not too far from San Diego Sea World.  Convenient to freeway.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you and your family enjoyed an EXCELLENT stay with us.  We are glad that you appreciated our location being convenient to all So. Cal. attractions you were here to visit on your vacation.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you next time.

Summary Heading: The Club next to the Hotel is LOUD
Summary: Be sure to request a room far away from the club next to the hotel. It can get very loud and difficult to fall asleep. The staff at the hotel when possible will make a room change. It is only about 15 minutes away from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are sorry that the Club adjacent to the Hotel was a noise challenge for you during your stay.  We hope that this will not stop you from staying with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Although renovating, rooms are very comfortable and newly remodeled
Summary: I stayed at this Embassy Suite for business. I read the reviews and some were not pleased due to construction. I stayed there because it was closest to my business visit. I was amazed at how nice and comfortable the rooms are. They have been recently renovated. Lobby is still being renovated so there is a makeshift table and noise after 9am due to construction. Quiet in the evening and night, so no worries about a good night sleep! I would stay there again.

I booked two rooms here to celebrate my mother's 70th birthday.  She had never been to Disneyland.  There is a shuttle that runs to the theme parks for $5 a person per day that is about a half hour trip; or the hotel is located just 15 minutes away by car.  Clean, quiet, and a typical Embassy Suites with breakfast and reception.

I stayed at Embassy Suites Anaheim North from Apr 8th to Apr 12th.  I booked 2 rooms for 4 nights.  We had 3 people in each room, unrelated, so we needed 2 beds in each room and the sofa couch.  Called 3 times to request/confirm that we had the 2 beds.  All 3 times positively confirmed.  Called and also said we would be late, and they said your rooms are paid for and will be held.  Arrive at 9:30 pm.  1 King bed in each room!!!  Night manager said we checked in late and there is no guarantee since we booked thru 3rd party.  I said, I called 3 times, and he said person answering phone could not guarantee 2 beds.   He said to book thru Embassy.  I said if Embassy is going to accept 3rd party reservations, they should try to accommodate those guests the same as those booked thru

The rooms were clean. The hotel is undergoing renovation and despite that the staff put forth nice effort to welcome us and navigate around it. The rooms are very comfortable with great beds. The cook to order breakfast is  a great way to start each day. We really enjoy the service very much.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valued feedback.  We are thrilled that you enjoyed your "staycation" at our Hotel.  We look forward to seeing you again next time.

Summary: The hotel itself was great, and my wife and I thoroughly enjoyed the complimentary breakfast.  However, a group of drunk club-goers at the club sharing the parking lot caused us to lose sleep between 2 and 3 am.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled that you enjoyed our Hotel.  We sincerely apologize for the disappointment about your lack of rest due to the Club that is located adjacent to our Hotel.   We do hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: There is remodeling going on so you have to be willing to put up with that. Otherwise, it is a pleasant stay and takes care of family needs. This Hotel, Anaheim North is preferred when planning trips to Disneyland. It is not quite as crowded as the Embassy Suites that is right across the street. It has regular shuttles that will take you to Disneyland and Downtown Disney. We prefer Anaheim North as opposed to the closer site because it is quieter and less crowded. It is still close enough to Disneyland to make it a pleasant experience
Manager Response: We are just thrilled that we had the opportunity to have you stay with us.  We try our best to assure that our ongoing hotel renovation enhancements do not affect our guests negatively and are happy to hear that you were able to still enjoy the Hotel and your vacation during our ongoing refurbishment project.  Additionally, you have the right idea about our location...we are close enough to Disney, Knots etc. to enjoy the parks however sometimes it’s nice to be able to come back to your Hotel and relax and enjoy without all of the hustle and bustle....it’s really the best of both worlds! Thank you for your feedback and your valued business.  We look forward to seeing you next time.

Summary: I was thoroughly disappointed with this property. It was like staying at a motel 6...horrible.  Carpet was filthy. Patios filthy. The room was old and lighting was horrible. Also the location is not good either.  They just started doing renovations on 4/6/15 so maybe after that is done, it will be much better. In the meantime, dont stay here!!!!
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished.  This is certainly not our goal as we are in the process of enhancing our Hotel for our guests enjoyment.   Considering our guestrooms were recently and completely remodeled we were surprised to hear this feedback.  I assure you that we will take all of your feedback seriously and will use this as a training opportunity for improvement in the future.  We hope that after our Hotel enhancement project that you will consider staying with us again so we can show you what our Hotel and Team are truly made of. Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: We stayed here for a couple of nights of theme park fun. The rooms are spacious and with modern decor - perfect. Breakfast will get crowded. There is construction right now in the lobby area but not too intrusive.  There is a shuttle to Disney, but it takes 30 minutes, going through neighborhoods, not freeways.  Beware of the room choice - the hotel backs against a recycling facility which is noisy all night. The best rooms are facing south, overlooking the Santa Ana river.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We try our best to assure that our ongoing hotel renovation enhancements do not affect our guests negatively and are happy to hear that you were able to enjoy the Hotel during our ongoing refurbishment project.  As you noticed we assure that there is no construction during sleeping hours.   We are thrilled that you had a nice stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Thank you for your valued business!

Summary Heading: Under renovation- a bit of a nightmare
Summary: Broken elevators, construction, backed up sinks.  I had a handicap room and had to walk all the around the back to access elevators because two out of four elevators were broken during my 3 day stay.  Sinks backed up with a terrible smell and had to be relocated 3 times in one day.
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and that your perception of our hotel has been tarnished.  This is certainly not our goal as we are working to improve our Hotel offerings and for this we do apologize.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again so we can show you a positive experience similar to what so many other guests are sharing while staying with us.

Summary: As a tour operator that deals with school groups, I enjoy staying at Embassy Suites when I can.  The Embassy Suites Anaheim North was just what I needed to complete a wonderful 5 day trip to the Anaheim area.   Disneyland Resort is very nearby with very easy access.  The breakfast area had plenty of seating and never a long line for my group even though we had over 100 people.   I don't think I've ever encountered such a friendly and helpful staff.  When they would ask us how our day went or what we did on a particular day, they weren't just making conversation, they were genuinely very interested and wanted to make sure we were having a great time. And I'm not talking about just one or 2 of the front desk staff but everyone at the desk and housekeeping too.  On my group's
Manager Response: We are just thrilled to hear that your Group enjoyed your stay with us and that our Hotel Team delivered on our promise to provide an excellent experience all around.  As General Manager of the Hotel it pleases me to hear that things happen as they should while our guests are staying with us. Thank you for your feedback and for your valued business!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights while visiting Disneyland and WonderCon. The room we had was a corner room facing the recycle center that is located behind the hotel. From our room you could hear the recycle center machines working 24-hours a day. We were on the 5th floor and could still hear everything. I would rather have heard the machines than hear the crazy children that were allowed to run around the perimeter of the hotel on all floors. One elevator out of four was not working. The began remodeling the hotel on Monday - loud noises and construction crew while working. The room itself was clean and comfortable for us. I like the 2 room suite. The room did have a mini fridge and microwave which we did use. Our cleaning staff/housekeeper did a terrible job of keeping 4
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: This hotel is just ok. The rooms are nice and the area is fine. No air conditioning fir us during some really warm weather. I complained and they offered to give me two nights free. Never saw that in the mail. The breakfast was good and I never attended the reception. This hotel is fine for Disney or Knotts because you spend most of the time at the parks.
